206a6(mdo sde): ba der song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po mdzes dgas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis
206a7(mdo sde): bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ mdzes dga'/ ngas zhu ba lung bstan
206b1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir 'di ltar thams cad skabs dbye bar bya'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa/ ston pa bde sbyin mdzad la zhu ba ni/ /spyad pa spyod tshe sug las ci bgyis dang / /bde ba'i lam gyis mya
206b2(mdo sde): ngan 'das reg pa/ /bde gshegs sbyin mdzad de ni lung bstan gsol/ /ma dros klu yi 'jig rten mgon de la/ /zhus pa bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan pa/ /dge ba'i
206b3(mdo sde): las kyi 'bras bus yid zhi zhing / /gang gi bde bas bde bar gshegs pa bskyed/ /sngon gyi srid par spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /skye bo thams cad bde bas bde ldan byas/ /de yis
206b4(mdo sde): legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /bde ba'i lam gyis mya ngan 'das reg 'gyur/ /ston pa'i gsung gis mdzes pa de dga' nas/ /de yi skad cig sa steng pus btsugs te/ /
206b5(mdo sde): gzhal med dga' yis sems ni dang bas su/ /'jig rten sgron ma 'dren la phyag 'tshal byed/ /ston pa'i blo yis mkhas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba kun las nges 'byung phyag
206b6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /'jigs med blo dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs gzhan min gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po lha mdzes kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
206b7(mdo sde): su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhus pa/ /'od mdzad spyan sdug legs pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /blo dge nyon mongs tshogs las rnam grol zhing / /ye shes dri med spyod yul khyod la ni/
207a1(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod tshe rnam thar bla med zhu/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten sman slad du/ /ji ltar spyad na byang chub zhi 'tshal zhing / /mi mchog dam
207a2(mdo sde): pa bdag gi spyod spyod pa/ /yid 'das de dag bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /rgyal ba de yis rdul bcom dbang po bsdams/ /'dod pa'i 'ching las thugs ni rnam grol
207a3(mdo sde): ba'i| |dgongs pa'i de nyid sems kyi rjes 'jug pa/ /thugs zhim dkrugs des ni lung bstan pa/ /mkhas pas dge ba dag ni spyad pa'i phyir/ /srog gi phyir yang yid ni mi ldog
207a4(mdo sde): cing | |rtag tu spyod tshe nyon mongs med yid kyis/ /lus dang dag gi dge ba mnyam spyod pa/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /'khor ba'i 'gro la spyod pa rnam dag
207a5(mdo sde): ste| |chu yi nang nas pad+ma skye ba ltag / gos pa med cing byang chub yang dag 'grub/ /bde gshegs gsung gis lha yi mdzes pa klu/ /de ni dga' zhing legs par mgu bas
207a6(mdo sde): su| |de yi skad cig sa la pus btsugs te/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog la phyag 'tshal byed/ /thub pa 'jig rten kun la sman mdzad pa/ /blo gros nges par zhi la phyag
207a7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /spyad pa spyod tshe khyod kyi rjes slob cing / /byang chub mi g.yo yid ni bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can don du spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /lus dang srog ni de bzhin
207b1(mdo sde): btang nas su/ /sdug bsngal thar byed sangs rgyas 'gyur ba dang / /byang chub zhi pa bla med thob pa'i bgyi/ /klu de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas su/ /rgyal ba dgra las rgyal ba
207b2(mdo sde): 'dzum mdzad de/ /de tshe ji ltar gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas zhing ni 'od kyis khyab/ /bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa bstan pa la/ /nam mkha'i lhas rig legs
207b3(mdo sde): so zhes gsol te/ /e ma'o rgyal bas rdul bcom dbang po bsgoms/ /khyod dang mnyam med gong na yong ma yin/ /sangs rgyas zhing mang dag ni rab g.yo sa shing / /'dod pa'i
207b4(mdo sde): lha ni sder bcas shin tu rmongs/ /lha tshogs mang po bsam pa rab dga' zhing / /rgyal ba dbang po thub la phyag 'tshal byed/ /ston pa'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i mchog
207b5(mdo sde): maud+gal bu yis rgyal la yongs zhus pa/ /gang gis dpag tu med pa'i 'dzum mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs rgyu gang rkyen gang lags/ /maud+gal bu yis rgyal la nyer
207b6(mdo sde): zhus pa| |the tshom gcod mdzad rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ /nga la mchod pa byed pa'i klu 'di ni/ /ma 'ongs pa yi dus na sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /ji snyed zhing 'di 'ong kyis
207b7(mdo sde): khyab pa dag / de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing gcig 'gyur/ /des na rgyal pa 'di ltar 'gyur ba ste/ /'dren pa de ming dbang po rgyal mtshan no/ /srog chags bye ba
208a1(mdo sde): khrag khrig mtha' yas dag / des ni 'gro srid pha rol sgrol byed de/ /'di la brten nas ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan/ /maud+gal bu khyod de ltar shes
208a2(mdo sde): par gyis/ /klu de lung bstan pa ni thos nas su/ /bla na med pa dag gi dga' bas khyab/ /lung bstan thos nas bar snang 'di las ni/ /ta la brgyad cu srid du mngon par
208a3(mdo sde): 'phags| |phyogs bcu dag na rnam dag rgyal ba'i zhing / /bzang la grangs med sangs rgyas de mthong ste/ /mthong nas sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog dag la/ /tshigs
208a4(mdo sde): bcad sna tshogs dag gis rgyal ba bstod/ /'gro ba phan skyed rgyal ba dgra las rgyal/ /dbang po thul cing ma nor de bzhin gsung / /'od mdzad bden gsung khyod la
208a5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs tshig rmongs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba
208a6(mdo sde): zhus pa| |'jigs sel sngags grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyad pa spyod tshe sug las ci bgyis pas/ /'jigs las grol dang 'gro ba thar bgyid pa/ /'jigs
208a7(mdo sde): sel lam zhugs bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /ji ltar 'dren pa bdag nyid 'jigs grol zhing / /skye bo 'jigs las rab tu grol mdzad pa/ /khyos kyis legs
208b1(mdo sde): par gsungs pa'i bka' thos nas/ /de bzhin ngoms med yid kyis spyad par bgyi/ /rgyu chen 'dzin pa klu yi rgya mtsho des/ /'gro la phan phyir ston la zhu byed pa/ /'jigs
208b2(mdo sde): bcas zhe sar bcas shing de brten nas/ /mi dbang spyan sngar zhe sar bcas pas 'dug /de yi bsam pa 'dren pas thugs chud nas/ /ji ltar spyad na 'jigs dang rnam
208b3(mdo sde): bral zhing / /sems can dag kyang 'jigs las thar byed pa/ /yan lag brgyad ldan gsung gis lung bstan to/ /byang chub spyad pa rjes su spyod bya zhing / /dbyug mtshon
208b4(mdo sde): med pas 'gro la rab tu ston/ /chu dang thang dang de bzhin g.yul 'thab pa'i/ /'jigs la yang dang yang du 'jigs med sbyin/ /de yis legs pa'i las ni byas pas na/ /
208b5(mdo sde): 'jigs par mi 'gro byang chub reg 'gyur la/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i byams pa'i sems kyis su/ /shin tu mi bzad bdud stobs rab skrag byed/ /stobs bcu'i mkhyen
208b6(mdo sde): pas rgya mtsho de dga' nas/ /de yi skad cig sa la pus btsugs te/ /'jigs par mi gnas zhi bar rab 'dug nas/ /bde bar gshegs la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal byed/ /
208b7(mdo sde): srid kun bdag la mi gnas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngang med 'jigs bral ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngang dang 'jigs las skye bo bsgral bgyi zhing / /de bzhin gshegs
209a1(mdo sde): pa mi dngas bdag 'gyur bgyi/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po gser gtsug gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus
209a2(mdo sde): pa| drang srong chen po spyan dge dbang po thul/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho brgal cing pha rol phyin/ /skam la bzhugs pa sred bskams gang zag mchog /'gro ba'i don phyir khyod zhu
209a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal gsol/ /ji ltar spyad na bde gshegs bdag skye zhing / /rgyal ba'i bstan la rab tu gnas gyur dang / /bdud phrag stong dag gis kyang mi bskyod pa/ /kun spyan
209a4(mdo sde): 'di dag bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /sangs rgyas tshul la mi g.yo rab gnas shing / /klu yi gtso bos 'dren la de zhus pa/ /klu yi bdag po'i bsam pa thugs chud nas/ /
209a5(mdo sde): nyon mongs kun spangs de ni lung bstan pa/ /lhag pa'i bsam pas chos kyi nges ldan zhing / /nges pa stong pa'i yul la rab tu gnas/ /srid las rnam rgyal bstan la mi
209a6(mdo sde): g.yo zhing / /gzhal med byang chub la ni 'dun pa bskyed/ /gser gtsug rdzu 'phrul che ba'i klu de ni/ /sangs rgyas gsung pa thos nas the tshom med/ /byang chub phyir ni mi
209a7(mdo sde): g.yo yid bskyed cing / /'jigs kun pha rol phyin la mngon par bstod/ /srid mtsho rgal cing skam la shin tu bzhugs/ /the tshom mi mnga' mi g.yo brtan brnyes shing / /
209b1(mdo sde): srid par 'khor brtan bzhin du rab bzhugs pa/ /ri rab ri la lha yi gnas bcas bzhin/ /'di ltar mi g.yo ba la skyabs mchi zhing / /mi g.yo ri lta bur ni 'gyur bar bgyi/ /de'i
209b2(mdo sde): tshe 'gul dang mi 'gul zhing mi gnas/ /mi g.yo ri rab lta bur 'gyur bar bgyi/ /ma smad pas ni de yi thugs chud nas/ /yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis lung bstan pa/ /bskal
209b3(mdo sde): pa stong phrag brgyad cur spyad byas nas/ /ma 'ongs pa yi dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /bde ba'i lam gyis rgyal bar 'gyur pa ste/ /mtshan ni legs mthong zhes bya shin tu sdug /srog
209b4(mdo sde): chags bye ba stong phrag thar byed cing / /bsil ba bde ba zhi ba'i lam 'god 'gyur/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa klu des thos nas su/ /gzhal med dga' ba'i sems ni rab dang bas
209b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs thams cad sel cing ma smad pa/ /'gro ba'i 'dren pa la ni phyag 'tshal byed/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po ut+pal mig gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i
209b6(mdo sde): dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /mi mchog 'dul mdzad gzi brjid mtha' yas pa/ /thugs rab zhi zhing nyer zhi pha rol gshegs/ /zhi gnas yon tan rab zhi rnam grol ba/ /
209b7(mdo sde): zhi ba mkhas pa bde bar gshegs pa gsung / /khyod sras byang chub ji ltar spyad bgyis na/ /zhi gnas dga' zhing zhi gnas bsten pa dang / /zhi gnas la ni ji ltar mkhas
210a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /kun gzigs myur du bdag gi som nyi khum/ /rgyal ba la ni klu des zhus pa dang / /rgyal bas ut+pal mig la lung bstan pa/ /
210a2(mdo sde): gang gis dge ba'i las kyi yid 'ong ba'i/ /zhi gnas la ni shin tu bslab par 'gyur/ /de phyir byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni/ /spyad pa spyod tshe sems g.yor mi
210a3(mdo sde): byed cing / /bskal pa bye bar zhi gnas sten byed pa/ /byang chub dam pa dpa' mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de yid rab zhi byang chub rtogs nas su/ /rnam 'dren 'gro ba
210a4(mdo sde): zhi la sbyor byed cing / /rab tu sems zhi g.yo bar mi 'gyur la/ /sems can nyon mongs mi g.yo zhi bar byed/ /des pa ut+pal mig gi klu des ni/ /rgyal bas legs
210a5(mdo sde): par gsungs pa'i tshig thos nas/ /nyon mongs kun g.yo yid ni zhi gyur te/ /byang chub mchog rab sems ni bskyed gyur to/ /de yi zhi gnas sems la brten
210a6(mdo sde): nas su| |byang chub sems bskyed rgyal ba de la bstod/ /khyod la bskyed nas zhi gnas rtogs gyur cing / /shin tu yid zhi sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/ /de nas
210a7(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa zhi gnas thugs su chud/ /rgyal ba gang zag
210b1(mdo sde): mchog la bdag zhu ba/ /khyod nyid las 'khrungs byang chub rab gnas pa/ /mi mchog ji ltar lhag mthong dag la spyad/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur la dga' bos zhus/ /klu de'i sngon
210b2(mdo sde): gyi mtha' ni gzigs pas na/ /dge ba'i las bsags pa dag thugs chud nas/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba 'di skad gsung / /ye shes dam pa byang chub mchog btsal
210b3(mdo sde): phyir| |ma zhum yid kyis nor dang 'bru dag la/ /ser sna med cing rdzas mang mi nyung dang / /chung ma dang ni bdag nyid gtong bar byed/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas
210b4(mdo sde): pa dang / /gtong ba shin tu sdug bsngal bsten pas na/ /ye shes dam pa bdag rgyal sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de ni lhag mthong spyad pa'i 'bras bu yin/ /de nas klu'i
210b5(mdo sde): rgyal po nyer dgas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ 'gro ba kun gyi 'dren la bdag zhu ba/ /khyod sras byang chub ji ltar spyad
210b6(mdo sde): bgyis na/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong mnyam par spyod pa dang / /zang zing med zhi byang chub 'thob 'gyur lags/ /'dren pa de la klu des zhus pa dang / /zhi gnas lhag mthong
210b7(mdo sde): yang dag len mkhyen pa/ /thogs pa med pa 'dren pa 'di brnyes pas/ /de ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la bzhag /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig spyad spyod tshe/ /
211a1(mdo sde): gnyis ka'i stobs 'di mnyam par bsten pas na/ /de ni bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing / /'gro ba'i don du mnyam par rnam par spyod/ /bskal
211a2(mdo sde): pa bye ba mang po de 'tshang rgya/ /zhing gi dam pa dag kyang 'god 'gyur te/ /de'i mtha' bsngags pa bskal pa bye mang du/ /sangs rgyas bye bas zad par de mi spyod/ /de tshe klu yi
211a3(mdo sde): bdag po nye dga' yis/ /theg pa mnyam pa'i bsngags pa thos nas su/ /gzhal du med pa'i dga' bas sems bde nas/ /byang chub mchog gi sems rab bskyed gyur
211a4(mdo sde): to| |'jig rten phan phyir byang chub de lung bstan/ /ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/ /ming ni rgyal ba 'dren pa kun spyan no/ /srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar par byed//
211a5(mdo sde): de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ bde gshegs khyod sras ji ltar spyad bgyis na/ /'gro ba'i don
211a6(mdo sde): du phan pa tshol byed cing / /byang chub bla ma tshol la mi skyo ba/ /rkang gnyis dam pa mchog gis de lung ston/ /mi yi khyu mchog la ni klus zhus pa/ /klu yi bdag po'i
211a7(mdo sde): bsam pa thugs chud de/ /thub pa sngon mtha' sbyor la mi 'jigs pas/ /klu yi bdag po'i the tshom lung bstan pa/ /byang chub zhi ba spyad pa spyod 'dod pa/ /des shing
211b1(mdo sde): nyams pa med par spyod pa dang / /bdag dang gzhan dag la yang mi gnod cing / /ser sna med cing gtong ldan rgyal ba yin/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /'gro ba gang
211b2(mdo sde): gi 'khor bar bde 'dod la/ /des shing thams cad du ni snying rjer ldan/ /nor byin pas ni sdud pa byed par 'gyur/ /de yis legs pa'i lam de byas pas na/ /nam du'ang skye
211b3(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu bde bas skye bo bder 'god la/ /kha na ma tho med cing gnas zhir 'jog /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de bskul bas na// mchog tu dga'
211b4(mdo sde): bas sems ni bder gyur te/ /de yis skad cig sa la pus btsugs nas/ /tshigs bcad sna tshogs dag gis rgyal bstod pa/ /gau tam 'jig rten kun na mnyam med de/ /
211b5(mdo sde): 'gro ba zil mnan bde gshegs lhang nge ba/ /khyod kyi zhal du lhar bcas 'gro kun lta/ /'di ltar thal mo sbyar nas skyabs su mchi/ /byang chub mchog gi yid ni bskyed
211b6(mdo sde): bgyi zhing / /'di ltar bde gshegs khyod kyi ye shes dang / /ston pa khyod kyis the tshom bsal ba ltar/ /bdag kyang thos nas 'jig rten the tshom bsal/ /de nas de'i ston
211b7(mdo sde): gzhal med byang chub phyir/ /yid ni shin tu dgyes nas bka' stsal pa/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dren par 'gyur ba yi/ /mi mchog ming ni dbang po chen po'o/ /de nas klu'i
212a1(mdo sde): rgyal po e ra ba nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /'jig rten dpag med mang po'i skyabs kyi mchog
212a2(mdo sde): rgyal ba the tshom gcod la zhu bgyi ba/ /byang chub sems dpas su ga las ci bgyis na/ /sangs rgyas mngon du lhan cig phrad ba 'thob/ /'jig rten mgon po de la klus zhus
212a3(mdo sde): nas| |'jig rten phan phyir 'dren pas lung bstan pa/ /sems can rgyud la nyon mongs rnam rig dang / /yongs su dul ba'i yid ni rnam shes nas/ /'gro la phan phyir
212a4(mdo sde): snying rje bskyed nas su/ /byang chub mchog gi don du spyad pa spong / /bdag dang rgyal bar ji ltar phrad snyam nas/ /thabs la mkhas par mngon par rab gnas te/ /
212a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba rnams dang bde gshegs mya ngan 'das/ /sku gdung dag la gzhal med mchod byed cing / /rnam grol yid kyis smon lam 'debs par byed/ /de yis
212a6(mdo sde): legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas mngon par phrad thob ste/ /rgyal ba mngon sum mchod pa byas nas su/ /byang chub dga' ba 'od ldan reg par
212a7(mdo sde): 'gyur| |sangs rgyas kyis ni legs gsungs tshig thos nas/ /er ba na klu ni yid mgu ste/ /gzhal du med pa'i dga' bas sems bde nas/ /dang ba'i yid kyis
212b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mngon bstod pa/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis bdag gi som nyi the tshom bsal/ /byang chub don du yid 'di bskyed bgyi ste/ /sdug bsngal
212b2(mdo sde): mthar bgyid sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/ /gang zag bdag gis klu yi bdag po yi/ /bsam pa thugs chud byang chub lung bstan pa/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ru/ /
212b3(mdo sde): spyod pa spyad nas de nas sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /mi mchog mtshan ni thams cad sgrol ba ste/ /srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar par byed/ /de yi ring bsrel mang por 'gyur ba
212b4(mdo sde): ste| |skye bo mang po mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /klu de ston pa'i gsung gis dga' gyur nas/ /'jig rten phan mdzad rnam 'dren mngon bstod pa/ /khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don
212b5(mdo sde): ni rgya cher mdzad/ /sdug bsngal mthar mdzad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bam po bcu gnyis pa/ de nas klu'i rgyal po tshib ba'i bus bcom ldan
212b6(mdo sde): 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten don slad du/ /'jig rten don mdzad rnam 'dren la zhu ba/ /spyod pa spyod tshe
212b7(mdo sde): sug las ci bgyis pas/ /ma rtogs rtogs nas rgyal ba rnam 'dren 'gyur/ /tshib pa'i bu des rgyal la mngon zhus nas/ /nyon mongs thams cad bsal bas lung
213a1(mdo sde): bstan pa/ /dge ba'i las kyis 'bras bu yid 'ong zhing / /nyon mongs bcom pas des na rgyal zhes bya/ /de ni 'gro kun tshe dang sangs rgyas la//
213a2(mdo sde): mchog tu dad pa dag gi sems kyang shes/ /de yis las kyi lam de byas pas na/ /'gro ba'i rtag pa rgyal ba dag tu 'gyur/ /de yis rgyal ba'i bshad pa thos nas
213a3(mdo sde): su| |'gro ba thams cad la ni dad par byas/ /de tshe de yis dge ba byas pas na/ /'di yi smon lam btab ltar bdag 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jig rten mgon pos de
213a4(mdo sde): lung bstan/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas su ni 'gyur ba ste/ /srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar byed cing / /spyad pa spyod tshe rgyal ba mngon par bstod/ /ston pa'i gsung
213a5(mdo sde): gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas la ni dad bskyed mngon bstod pa/ /'gro ba thar mdzad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam yas bde gshegs khyod
213a6(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po nag pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ drang srong chen po skyabs mchog dpag
213a7(mdo sde): tu med| |skyon dang bral zhing yon tan mchog brnyes pa/ /stobs bcu'i 'jigs pas rnam gnod khyod la ni/ /byang chub zhi spyod mkhas pa rab gnas zhu/ /
213b1(mdo sde): des pa'i nyon mongs ji ltar bsal ba dang / /rgyal ba'i mchog nyid ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ /bdud kyi spyod yul de dag ji ltar spang / /sangs rgyas spyod yul dag la ji
213b2(mdo sde): ltar spyad/ /rgyal ba la ni klu des zhus pa dang / /ji ltar bde gshegs spyod yul spyad pa dang / /ji ltar bdud kyi spyod yul spang ba dag /lam gnyis shin tu mkhyen pas rab tu bsten
213b3(mdo sde): ston pa la ni klu bdag des zhus nas/ /de yi bsam pa thugs chud lung bstan pa/ /mi mkhas gang dag sems can 'du shes spyod/ /de dag nag po'i rtsa lag spyod yul spyod/ /
213b4(mdo sde): gang dag sems can med cing yid mi gnas/ /de dag thams cad gzigs pa'i spyod yul spyod/ /nag po'i rtsa lag dag las rgyal nas su/ /byang chub bla med zhi ba des thob bo//
213b5(mdo sde): ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /bdud kyi spyod yul myur par rnam spangs te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs ltar spyod yul dag /bsten pas de ni myur du rgyal bar
213b6(mdo sde): 'gyur| |de nas klu'i rgyal po gau ta mas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /kha lo sgyur mchog khyod la zhu bgyi ba/ /'dren pa khyod sras ji
213b7(mdo sde): ltar spyad bgyis nas/ /klu yi skye gnas dag ni gcod bgyid cing / /sangs rgyas tshul gyi myu gu skyed par bgyid/ /bde bar gshegs la klu des zhus pa dang / /de yi bsam pa
214a1(mdo sde): thugs chud lung bstan pa/ /sems can med la rgyal ba'i sras spyod cing / /byang chub sems la nam yang de mi gnas/ /de ni stong nyid khong du chud pa
214a2(mdo sde): yin| |mkhas pa mtshan ma smon lam rnams spangs shing / /mdzangs pa mi dmigs pa la gnas bdag /'di ni sangs rgyas chos mngon myu gu bskyed/ /ston pa'i gsung
214a3(mdo sde): gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /mi dmigs pa la brten par rab gnas shing / /bdud kyi zhags bcings dam pa bcad nas su/ /sangs rgyas tshul la klu ni rab tu gnas/ /
214a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/ /ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/ /rnam thar rgyal zhes phyogs su rnam grags shing / /bdud kyi dbang song srog
214a5(mdo sde): chags thar par byed/ /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byed/ /khyod kyi lam bstan pas na sangs rgyas bsten/ /mi
214a6(mdo sde): mchog thar mdzad zhing la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po ka ma pa la'i sgras bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /zla ba'i 'od
214a7(mdo sde): ltar dri med mthu che zhing / /mi mchog rang byung gyur la zhu bgyi ba/ /rnam 'dren sras ni ji ltar spyad bgyis na/ /phan par 'jug cing rjes su skye bar 'gyur/ /gal te stong
214b1(mdo sde): nyid smon med rjes song zhing / /phung po mtshan mo mi ldan bral pa dang / /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos dang rnam shes na/ /pha yi lam du bu yang rjes 'gro 'gyur/ /ston pas legs par
214b2(mdo sde): gsungs pa de dga' nas/ /dmigs su med pa yin sems bskyed do/ /'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/ /rjes su mthun 'di spyod pa spyad byas shing / /zhing mchog
214b3(mdo sde): dag kyang yongs su sbyangs nas su/ /ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/ /zla bas lhag par phyogs su rnam grags shing / /srid par 'gro ba'i sems can thar par byed//
214b4(mdo sde): kam pa la zhes ming btags klu de ni/ /shAkya sras mkhas byang chub lung bstan nas/ /sems ni dga' zhing yongs su yid mgu ste/ /'gro kun thar par mdzad la mngon bstod pa//
214b5(mdo sde): thub pa che la 'di ltar skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas 'gyur bar the tshom bdag ma mchis/ /mun pa dag la sgron ma gzung bgyi zhing / /long ba mig ma mchis la lam bstan bgyi/ /
214b6(mdo sde): de nas klu'i bdag po yul 'khor srung gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /mgon po 'jig rten long bar gyur ba'i mig /mig sbyin
214b7(mdo sde): sman pa drang srong che la zhu/ /gang gis 'jig rten rnam thar lam bzang zhing / /zhi ba'i sar mchis rkang gnyis dbang po gsungs/ /stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' rnam thar lam
215a1(mdo sde): ston pa| / 'jig rten mgon po rkang gnyis dbang pos de lung bstan/ /gang gis yun ring bzhugs pa'i sdug bsngal lam zhi zhing / /'khor ba nyer
215a2(mdo sde): zhi mya ngan 'das pa gsal bar 'gro / ston la klu yi rgyal po lam zhi thos nas su/ /sdug bsngal ba la snying rje dam pa bskyed byas shing / /klu yi rgyal pos byang chub 'dun pa
215a3(mdo sde): drag bskyed do/ /stobs bcu'i stobs 'chang 'jig rten mgon du bdag 'gyur byed/ /stobs bcu'i yon tan mnga' bas klu dbang lung bstan pa/ /mi yi seng+ge bdag nyid mu
215a4(mdo sde): stegs dgrar 'gyur zhing / /sems can mtha' yas dpag med 'khor bar 'gro ba dag /bde gshegs mchog gi tshig gis 'dren cing thar par byed/ /ston pa'i gsung
215a5(mdo sde): mchog klu yi rgyal pos thos nas su/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis sor bcu'i rtse mo thal sbyar te/ /mi dbang 'jig rten mgon po drang srong chen po la/ /gus pa bskyed nas
215a6(mdo sde): 'khrul med tshig gis mngon bstod pa/ /skyabs mchog shin tu thugs gzhungs mtshungs med ye shes tog /'gro ba'i dge ba spyod cing dge la yun ring dang / /'gro
215a7(mdo sde): ba'i bsam pa mtha' yas khyod kyis thugs chud pas/ /des na mi dbang khyod ni 'jig rten rgya cher grags/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po gser mgrin gyis bcom ldan 'das la
215b1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' stobs che stobs dang ldan pa ste/ /thugs dge snang mdzad 'od dang ldan zhing sdig mi mnga'/ /srid rgyal blo gros
215b2(mdo sde): bzang bas 'gro ba shin tu mkhyen/ /rgyal ba dge sbyong shin tu dri med zhal gsungs shig /mi mchog rdul bral khyod sras ji ltar spyad bgyis na/ /mkhas pa ma dkrugs
215b3(mdo sde): ma bskyod pa dag thugs chud cing / /rgyal ba rdul bral dpag med brgya ni yongs su mkhyen/ /rgyal sras skye bo phan mdzad thugs su chud pa'i spyan/ /blo gros dpag med mnga' ba
215b4(mdo sde): lha mi mkhas pa yis/ /bla mar bgyis shing rgyal ba dpag med sa yas bskor/ /mkhas pa dus su 'gro ba dpag med phan mdzad dgongs/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba klu yi
215b5(mdo sde): 'gro ba zhus pa gsungs/ /blo 'chal bral zhing blo gtsang rjes dgongs brtag pa mdzod/ /nga yi sras mchog rgyal bsten rga shi zad byed pa/ /'thob cing rgyal bas mchod
215b6(mdo sde): cing rdul med skyon bral re/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dpag med brgya shes yongs su 'grol/ /stobs bcu blo gros mnga' bas klu yi bdag po yis/ /rga shi zad bya thos nas rab tu
215b7(mdo sde): yid dga' ste/ /'gro la phan yid byang chub yid byas rgyal ba'i mchog /rnam 'dren blo mnga' 'gro la phan mdzad mngon bstod pa/ /'gro ba mang po'i mun pa rab rib ling
216a1(mdo sde): tog dag / gcod mdzad 'gro 'di'i sdug bsngal 'joms shing mun pa dang / /rab rib ling tog kun nas sel mdzad bdud rtsi'i lam/ /shin tu
216a2(mdo sde): dri med spyan mnga' dge ba phyogs bcur ston/ /klu yi bdag po'i gser dngul lta bu'i khyim gshegs shing / /yon tan dpag med mnga' ba shin tu thugs su chud/ /blo gros
216a3(mdo sde): ston mdzad 'od zer stong 'dra'i spyan mnga' zhal/ /ma 'khrul ma blong ma smad gzi che mkhas pa'i gzi/ /stobs bcu 'od chen mnga' la 'gro ba'i tshig gis bstod/ /rgyal
216a4(mdo sde): mchog bdag nyid bde ldan sangs rgyas byang chub nas/ /'gro ba 'khyams shing mngon med rga shi sdug bsngal gyis/ /nyam thag sdug bsngal dpag med bsal te thar par
216a5(mdo sde): bgyi| / bde dang zhi dang zhi ba rdul med rgya che sel/ /zhi ba'i lam du zhugs nas bdag ni sangs rgyas bgyi/ /rgyal ba brgya yis thugs chud bdud kyi stobs dag ni/ /stobs med
216a6(mdo sde): bgyi zhing mi mkhas pa dag gzhug par bgyi/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po mgrin sngon gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /ston mchog
216a7(mdo sde): 'dul ba kha lo sgyur la zhu bgyi ba/ /'dren pa khyod kyi sras ni ji ltar spyad bgyis na/ /kha na ma tho med cing zhi la rdul bral dang / /nyon mongs med cing byang chub dam pa
216b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i don du 'dren pas gsungs pa gang / /dpa' bo khyod nyid las 'khrungs sras thos nas/ /kha na ma tho med cing bdag dang gzhan/ /sangs rgyas
216b2(mdo sde): 'gyur dang byang chub the tshom khum/ /mgrin sngon klu de yis ni zhus pa dang / /'jig rten kun la chags pa med pa'i thugs/ /chos rnams kun la mi 'jigs dbang brnyes shing / /
216b3(mdo sde): ston pa'i gsung la legs gnas lung bstan pa/ /nga sras 'jig rten gsum la ma chags shing / /'gro la phan par spyad pa spyod byed pa/ /'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs
216b4(mdo sde): kyi khams dag dang / /gzugs med khams su'ang ched du mi skye'o/ /mya ngan 'das dbyings gzhal med 'dus ma byas/ /thams cad kyi ni sdug bsngal zad cing 'gog /de ni
216b5(mdo sde): nyer bzung 'jig rten gos med yin/ /rgyal ba rgyal ba'i dbang po rab tu sgom/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /gos pa med cing 'jigs med rnam spyod la/ /
216b6(mdo sde): bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa med gnas te/ /bdag nyid bla med byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya/ /de ni rnam smin de las rjes mthun pa/ /shin tu dga' bas byang chub 'tshang
216b7(mdo sde): rgyar 'gyur/ /de yi skye bo srog chags lha dang klu/ /mi dang srin po dag gis mi mthong ngo / /klu mgrin sngon po stobs po che de ni/ /sangs rgyas kun mkhyen gsung gis
217a1(mdo sde): dga' gyur nas/ /sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar mgo btud de/ /'jig rten sgron mdzad 'dren la phyag 'tshal byed/ /mi mchog la ni 'di ltar bdag
217a2(mdo sde): skyabs mchi/ /yab kyi rjes su sras kyang mchi bgyi zhing / /mthar bgyid bcom la byang chub 'tshang rgyar bgyi/ /sems can sdug bsngal chos kyis gnod gyur dgrol/ /
217a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/ /khyod ni ma 'ongs dus su 'tshang rgya ste/ /kun tu spyan zhes phyogs su rnam grags shing / /'gro ba'i srid las sems can
217a4(mdo sde): grol bar byed/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po 'jigs sgrog gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba yid las 'das//
217a5(mdo sde): ston pa sug las ci bgyis bdag zhu 'o/ /rgyal ba de ni snam phyogs gzigs pa na/ /dkyil 'khor tsam gyis ni mdun du 'gyur/ /chos la nges pa'i rgyal bas de lung
217a6(mdo sde): bstan| |kun mkhyen mkhyen pas bsam pa thugs chud nas/ /bla na med pa'i thugs ni bskyed mdzad de/ /de bzhin mi mchog gis ni 'di lung bstan/ /bde ba 'byung
217a7(mdo sde): ba dag gi las byas shing / /de dag sngon chad yang dang yang dran pas/ /de yi rnam smin las ni 'di ltar shes/ /de yi gzigs par sa ni 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyal
217b1(mdo sde): bas legs gsungs tshig ni thos nas su/ /klu rgyal de ni mchog tu dga' gyur nas/ /'phags pa'i zang zing med pa'i dga' bskyed de/ /nga rgyal bcom nas sangs rgyas
217b2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal byed/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ lam stor ba la lam ni rab ston cing / /'jig
217b3(mdo sde): rten don mdzad 'dren la zhu bgyi ba/ /sngon tshe rtag tu 'phrin las ci mdzad na/ /ji ltar dgongs pa bzhin du zhi gnas mdzad/ /'jig rten mgon po rgyal bas de lung
217b4(mdo sde): bstan| |sems can klu ni gdul ba'i dus bab cing / /'gro ba thams cad la ni phan pa'i phyir/ /'dren pa bdud stobs 'joms pas lung bstan pa/ /'das pa'i
217b5(mdo sde): dus su spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /tshul bzhin ma yin sems dang gnyen min pa'i/ /nams kyang mi sems rtag tu zhi gnas bsten/ /de la ngas ni yun ring bslab pa
217b6(mdo sde): yin| |de bzhin rgyal ba dag gi mchod rten la/ /phreng ba rin chen dag ni bkram zhing phul/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /nyon mongs sems dang nams
217b7(mdo sde): kyang mi gnas so/ /nga yis bskal pa stong phrag bye ba ru/ /gzhan la gnod pas nams kyang gnod ma byas/ /nga ni de yis las kyi rnam smin rgyus/ /ji ltar bsam
218a1(mdo sde): bzhin zhi gnas bsten par byed/ /drang srong che bas lung bstan 'di thos nas/ /gzi can klu ni dga' bar gyur pa na/ /gzhal du med pa'i bde
218a2(mdo sde): bas sems dga' nas/ /ston pa'i mdun 'dug tshigs su bcad pas bstod/ /'gro ba'i kun ldang nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing / /de dag sems zhi khyod kyi bstan pa mdzad//
218a3(mdo sde): thub pa nyon mongs med par 'jig rten spyod/ /zla 'od lta bur blo zhi phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs
218a4(mdo sde): kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /sngon tshe dag tu 'phrin las ci mdzad na/ /thub pa khyod kyis sku la rdul mi gos/ /dpe med rnam gnon 'di dag bdag la gsungs/ /gang dag thos nas
218a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i las spyad bgyi/ /rnam par snang byed dge ba tshol ba'i klus/ /'jig rten mgon de la ni zhus pa dang / /nyon mongs kun sel yan lag brgyad ldan zhing / /snyan
218a6(mdo sde): cing 'jebs pa'i sgras ni lung bstan pa/ /nga yis sngon chad byang chub tshol ba na/ /nam yang tshul bzhin ma yin ngas ma bsams/ /nam yang rab tu nyes sems ngas ma
218a7(mdo sde): bskyed| |bla med byams las yang dang yang du byas/ /nga yis dge ba'i las de byas pas na/ /bla med byang chub zhi ba reg nas su/ /mi mchog rgyal ba thub pa'i sku dag dang //
218b1(mdo sde): na bza' la yang rdul gyis mi gos so/ /rgyal ba'i 'phrin las dge bsags de thos nas/ /rnam par snang byed klu ni yid dga' ste/ /sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas mgo bo yis/ /
218b2(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i zhabs la mngon par phyag 'tshal byed/ /legs so rgyal ba mu byed sngon du gshegs/ /khyod kyis rgya che mtha' yas don dag mdzad/ /srid pa'i tshogs la dga'
218b3(mdo sde): zhing sdug bsngal gyis/ /gdungs pa'i 'gro ba mtha' dag khyod kyis bsgrol/ /skye bo dug gdug reg pa'i sman pa ste/ /skye bo dug bcom khyod ni gso sman lags/ /me 'bar zhi
218b4(mdo sde): ltar rim gyis mya ngan 'da'/ /'di ltar thal sbyar mgos btud skyabs su mchi/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po bsgyings pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu
218b5(mdo sde): ba zhus pa/ rnam 'dren dge ba'i 'phrin las ci mdzad na/ /zhabs ni shin tu mnyam zhing brtan pa brnyes/ /gang dag thos nas shin tu yid dga' 'thob/ /mi yi mchog gyur
218b6(mdo sde): de dag bdag la gsungs/ /klu yi rgyal po bsgyings pas rnam par 'dren/ /'jig rten mkhas pa de yis zhus pa dang / /yid du 'ong ba'i tshigs bcad sna tshogs kyis/ /klu
218b7(mdo sde): yi rgyal po yid ni dga' bar gyur/ /nga yis tshul khrims brtul zhugs rnam dag bsgrubs/ /nga yis gzhan yang tshul khrims brtul zhugs bsgoms/ /ngas ni dge ba'i
219a1(mdo sde): las de byas pas na/ /rkang pa mnyam pa dag gis sa la reg /de tshe thams cad mkhyen pas lung bstan pa/ /rdul bral klu ni yid dga' mgu gyur
219a2(mdo sde): nas| |gzhal du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' ste/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog la phyag 'tshal byed/ /legs so rgyal pa 'od mdzad rdul bcom zhing / /shin tu
219a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs bag chags bcas pa bcom/ /zla nya'i dkyil 'khor sgra gcan gyis btang ltar/ /dgra bcom nas ni phyogs rnams rab tu gsal/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po 'od
219a4(mdo sde): chen gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten sman slad du/ /'jig rten 'das gsung 'dren la zhu
219a5(mdo sde): bgyi ba| / rkang gnyis dam pa sug las ci bgyis na/ /rnam 'dren gnas ma lags pa 'tshal ba 'thob/ /sngon tshe dag tu spyad pa spyod pa ni/ /lus dang ngag yid dang
219a6(mdo sde): ni sems kyis kyang / /bde ba 'byung ba'i yang dag las byas te/ /las gang byas pas nam yang gdung mi 'gyur/ /rab tu dga' zhing dge bas brlan pa dang / /
219a7(mdo sde): gnas ma yin pa'i lam gol thams cad ni/ /dge bcu las kyi lam gyis rnam par sbyangs/ /gnas ma yin pa'i nyon mongs thams cad bcom/ /rnam 'dren de
219b1(mdo sde): yis las de mdzad pas na/ /'di nas 'phos nas gzhan 'phrul dag tu gshegs/ /mi yis 'jig rten brnyes nas der 'das te/ /bla med gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'thob/ /gnas
219b2(mdo sde): ma yin pa shes la nam yang ni/ /bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyis bskyod mi nus/ /sems dang de bzhin nyon mongs yid grol te/ /de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu
219b3(mdo sde): mkhyen| |ston pas lung bstan pas ni 'od chen klu/ /yid ni mgu zhing shin tu dga' gyur te/ /gzhal du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' nas/ /yon tan pha rol
219b4(mdo sde): gshegs la phyag 'tshal byed/ /shin tu thugs dul yid gnyis 'joms pa po/ /'dam las rgal cing skam la shin tu bzhugs/ /thub chen rgal cing 'gro ba sgrol
219b5(mdo sde): mdzad pa/ /ji ltar nyi mas mun pa bsal nas su/ /gzugs kyi rnam pa snang zhing gsal ba ltar/ /de bzhin ston pa'i thugs ni rnam grol zhing / /sems can sdug bsngal
219b6(mdo sde): mang gnod mthar mdzad pa/ /mig sbyin gso ba'i dpyad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rab tu gdung byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i
219b7(mdo sde): dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ rgyal ba gser mdog 'phrin las ci mdzad na/ /dus gsum mkhyen la rab tu brtan par bzhugs/ /nam mkha' lta bur mkhyen ldan zhu ba gyis
220a1(mdo sde): pa| |'gro ba'i 'dren pa de dag bdag la gsungs/ /thogs med mkhyen pas thugs ni ma chags shing / /som nyi gcod la the tshom sel mdzad
220a2(mdo sde): pa| |rgyal ba rang byung thugs kyis de'i bsam pa/ /shin tu thugs chud de ni lung bstan pa/ /rtag tu dge ba dran ldan sten byed cing / /nges pa'i las byas pas ni bde
220a3(mdo sde): 'byung dang / /rtag tu gzhan yang shes la 'jog byed cing / /bdag nyid ji tsam shes pa ser sna med/ /mkhas pa de yis las de byas pas na/ /lus ni zhig nas ni gzhan
220a4(mdo sde): 'phrul dag tu 'gro/ /'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha gnas dang / /thur du 'bab cing mi yi nang du 'byung / /dus gsum shes la rnam par brtse byed cing / /bdag dang de
220a5(mdo sde): bzhin gzhan yang shes par byed/ /pags pa srab cing blo dang ldan gyur pa/ /bde gshegs thogs pa med pas lung bstan to/ /shin tu blo ldan mchog gis bstan
220a6(mdo sde): thos nas/ /klu chen rab tu gdung byed dga' gyur te/ /byang chub gzhal du med la rang gnas shing / /yang dag bsngags pas mi mchog rgyal ba bstod/ /dus gsum
220a7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid gcig tu gzigs mdzad cing / /las dang rnam smin de bzhin rab tu mkhyen/ /sems can dag gi khyad par bde ba mkhyen/ /bde gshegs thams cad
220b1(mdo sde): gtong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po stobs chen gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ mi mchog mchog rab mkhyen rab
220b2(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa/ /mgon po rdul bral thugs ni yongs su dag /bdag gi som nyi myur sol the tshom yang / /skyen par dgu ma phyir bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /
220b3(mdo sde): ji ltar sngon tshe mi dang lha dag gis/ /sug las bgyis pa blo mkhas ji ltar 'tshal/ /ji ltar bla med byang chub mchog thob pa/ /bdag gis the tshom zhus pa myur bar gsungs//
220b4(mdo sde): stobs bcu'i stobs mkhyen bdag nyid shin tu nges/ /rgyal la klu yis zhus myur gsung ste/ /nga yis ji ltar mi yi spyod kun dang / /dge ba'i bsam pas byang chub tshol byed
220b5(mdo sde): cing / /ji ltar yid rab dga' bas bsgrubs pa dang / /ji ltar skye rgu sdug bsngal gyis gnod cing / /tha ma mthong la ngan 'gror ltung ba dang / /nyon mongs brgya yis mun par gyur
220b6(mdo sde): pa shes| |der ni sems can snying pos snying rje bskyed/ /nga yis sems can 'di dag sdug bsngal dgrol/ /thar par 'gyur ba'i lam mchog dag tu bzhag /nga yis ngan
220b7(mdo sde): 'gro dag gi lam ngan dgag / nga yis lam mchog zhi ba rab tu bstan/ /bde ba'i lam gyis byang chub zhi bar bkur/ /stobs bcu'i lam mchog rab tu bstan bya zhing / /yun
221a1(mdo sde): ring mi dag gis ni don 'gyur bya/ /de ltar brtan pa ngas ni snying rje bskyed/ /drang srong chen po'i dge tshul bsgrubs nas su/ /mgo dang mig
221a2(mdo sde): dang de bzhin sha dag ni/ /btang nas bde gshegs lam nas dpa' bo 'gro/ /sngon gyi dus su mi yis spyad pa ni/ /de tshe rmi lam lta bur rab tu mkhyen/ /dge ba 'di
221a3(mdo sde): dag mi yis shes pa na/ /stobs bcu mnga' la mchod pa rtsol bar byed/ /mgon la gzhal med de bzhin dad bskyed nas/ /ji ltar 'gro kun mgon du bdag 'gyur snyam//
221a4(mdo sde): ji ltar skye bo phongs tshe bdag gis ni/ /stobs bcus bstan pa'i lam la gzhag par bya/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag bsten pa na/ /'dren pa dag gis spyad la rjes su bslab//
221a5(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas su/ /lam gol song ba rnams la lam mchog bstan/ /'di ltar bdag nyid chen po'i spyad spyod na/ /mi yis sngon gyi 'phrin las
221a6(mdo sde): byas pa mthong / /rmi lam lta bur byas par rnam rig cing / /de ni dran la pha rol dag la'ang ston/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bka' ni thos nas su/ /stobs chen klu ni yid dga'
221a7(mdo sde): mgu gyur nas/ /sor bcu'i thal mo spyi bor sbyar btud de/ /byang chub zhi thob bya phyir rgyal ba bstod/ /rnam par 'dren la bdag gis dad bskyed pas/ /stobs bcu'i
221b1(mdo sde): mdzad pa dag ni bdag gis bgyi/ /skye bo lam gol 'gro zhing mun gyur rnams/ /byang chub zhi ba thob par bdag gis bgyi/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po sprin chen pos bcom ldan 'das la
221b2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ stobs bcu mnga' ba skye bo yongs grol mdzad/ /'dren pa rang byung la ni bdag 'di zhu/ /ji ltar ston pa'i sras kyis brtson
221b3(mdo sde): bskyed na/ /zhi ba rdul med byang chub mchog 'thob 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus stobs kyis su/ /bla med byang chub byang chub sems 'thob pa/ /yon tan dpag
221b4(mdo sde): med ye shes mchog mnga' ba'i/ /drang srong chen pos sras zhus lung bstan pa/ /byang chub don du nga yis sngon spyad pa/ /ji ltar 'gro ba rnams su stobs brtson bsten/ /brtson
221b5(mdo sde): 'grus stobs kyis byang chub ngas brnyes pa/ /de ni nga yis cung zad bshad par bya/ /'das pa'i dus su mi bdag byung ba ni/ /mi yi dbang phyug mi dbang stobs 'chang
221b6(mdo sde): zhes| |rin chen bdun yod bu dang ldan pa ste/ /bdag las skyes ba khri phrag brgya dag byung / /de tshe 'jig rten khams 'di'ang rgyas pa ste/ /ri bong bdag ces sangs rgyas
221b7(mdo sde): zhing dag byung / /der ni mi mchog rang byung byung gyur pa/ /rin chen dpal zhes 'jig rten sgra rnams grags/ /mi mchog de yis nyan thos dge 'dun ni/ /sa ya phrag ni brgyad
222a1(mdo sde): cu dag byung ngo / /bde gshegs mchog gi rjes skyes sras tshogs ni/ /nyon mongs khro dang nga rgyal 'chang bral ba'o/ /de tshe mi mchog de yi byang
222a2(mdo sde): chub sems/ /sa ya phrag ni brgyad cu dag byung ste/ /rgyal ba dpag med dag la spyad ldan zhing / /'gro la phan phyir byang chub 'thob 'gyur ro/ /de ni rnam par 'dren pa
222a3(mdo sde): de yi ni| |byang chub sems dpa' bdud bsten zhes bya byung / /drang srong chen po bdud stobs rab 'joms pa/ /de yis tshogs kyi gtso bo de byed do/ /de nas bdud
222a4(mdo sde): stobs bsnyen par dka' zhes pa/ /lha'i bu byung nas 'dren pa rgyal ba'i mchog /de ni byang chub mchog tu gshegs pa la/ /ji ltar mi reg bya phyir bar chad byed/ /sa
222a5(mdo sde): 'di rgya mtshor bcas pa yon tan ldan/ /de dag bud med tshogs kyis mngon sprul te/ /bzang mo yon tan rab mtshog 'dzin pas bkang / /dga' ba'i tshig dang yid 'ong
222a6(mdo sde): tshig smra zhing / /mig ni bzang la 'gros kyang lde ma bag can/ /glang po'i sna ltar lag mnyam pa yi mdog /yun ring dag tu brtul zhugs 'dzin pa ste/ /nu ma sra la
222a7(mdo sde): legs dang ldan pa yin/ /ngag tshig snyan cing pad+ma 'dra ba'i mig /so yi phreng ba thags dam 'chang ba ste/ /byu ru'i mdog ltar mchu ni mdzes pa yin/ /bzhin dang 'gram
222b1(mdo sde): pa dag ni mdzes dang ldan/ /bzhin gyi mdog ni zla ba dri med 'phrog /'dzum zhing tshig ni snyan pa gtong ba ste/ /glang mchog myos pa lta bur mdzes pa'i 'gros/ /ngo tsha shes pas blo gros
222b2(mdo sde): ngan pa spangs/ /nu ma sra zhing tshigs kyis zin pa ste/ /ri dwags rgyal po lta bur de'i lus 'chang / /bzang mo'i lus ngos srab cing 'jam dang ldan/ /ri dwags rgyal po'i byin
222b3(mdo sde): 'dra rtse 'gro zhing / /rkang pa mnyams la 'jol ba'i thabs su 'gro /'dod chags ldang bar 'gyur ba'i bu mo dag /bdud kyis sa rnams thams cad gang byas pa/ /dmar bzung
222b4(mdo sde): du ldan pa'i myos ma ste/ /bdud kyis bdud kyi zhags pa mdun du bstan/ /de yi 'dod pa bdud stobs thams cad dag /de tshe bskyed nas bdud bsten 'jigs byas kyang / /nag
222b5(mdo sde): po'i rtsa lag de yis gtse ma nus/ /bar chad bya bar rab tu ma tshugs so/ /de nas shin tu mi bzad srin po ni/ /bye ba dag gis tshig rtsub smra bar byed/ /dpag tu med cing bsam
222b6(mdo sde): yas mu med pa/ /lus bong mtha' yas mngon sprul tshig rtsub smra/ /mdung thung mda' bo che yis rgyob cig rgyob/ /'di yi klad pa myur du ri yis chom/ /'di yi snying la gzi brjid
222b7(mdo sde): yod pa phrogs/ /myur du dus las 'da' zhing 'gog par gyis/ /thang gcig tsam yang 'di ni srog ma sbyin/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan bde bsten na/ /bdag gi rgyal
223a1(mdo sde): srid gnod pa med par 'gyur/ /nga yi yang dag tshig de thos nas su/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'phel bar ma byed cig /de tshe bong bu'i rnam pa mngon
223a2(mdo sde): sprul pa/ /mgo gcig pa dang mgo gnyis pa dag byung / /srin po rnams ni sgra bo che dag 'bod/ /la la mdung dang mda' bo che dag thogs/ /la la dag kyang ri ni khyer ba ste/ /
223a3(mdo sde): la la sdang ba'i sems kyis sbrul 'dzin cing / /de yi mdun du shin tu sgra dag 'byin/ /de tshe la la gnod sbyin mngon sprul te/ /lus gcig pa dang lus gnyis lag pa ni/ /
223a4(mdo sde): gsum dag yod cing lus bzhi lag pa gcig /de tshe lus gcig mngon par sprul byas shing / /de tshe de bzhin mgo bzhi mngon par sprul/ /de nas lus gcig mngon
223a5(mdo sde): par sprul byas te/ /de dag bong bu ra dang byi la dang / /stag gi gdong ste 'jigs par byed pa dag /so so mi 'dra ba yi skad dag 'byin/ /bong bu'i gdong ni ra yi skad
223a6(mdo sde): 'byin cing / /ra yi gdong ni bong bu'i skad 'byin la/ /bong bu glang po'i skad dang rta skad 'byin/ /bong bu gcig gi kha nas skad kun 'byin/ /de tshe ra yi kha nas thams
223a7(mdo sde): cad skad/ /shin tu 'jigs skad dpag tu med pa 'byin/ /gzhan yang bde gshegs bsnyen par bya ba'i phyir/ /glang po kha nas tshig rtsub dpag med 'byin/ /de
223b1(mdo sde): tshe glang po bong bu'i skad 'byin cing / /de bzhin rta dang de bzhin glang po dag /rnam pa mtha' yas skad dag 'byin byed kyang / /bde gshegs ba spu'i khung bu'ang ma g.yos so/ /
223b2(mdo sde): rta ni glang po'i skad dag 'byin byed cing / /de bzhin spre'u ni rta yi skad dag 'byin/ /spre'u yi kha nas mtha' yas skad 'byin kyang / /bde gshegs ba spu'i khung yang g.yos ma
223b3(mdo sde): gyur| |ri dwags rgyal po wa yi skad 'byin cing / /bong bu'i phyugs dang bya byi rta skad 'byin/ /de tshe rnam 'dren gtse bar ma nus shing / /ba spu'i khung bu'ang g.yos par ma gyur
223b4(mdo sde): to| |de tshe stag ni phag gi skad 'byin cing / /de tshe phyugs dang bya ni sprul skad 'byin/ /rnam 'dren de ni gtse bar ma nus shing / /bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /ri
223b5(mdo sde): dwags khyu mchog seng+ge'i skad 'byin cing / /byi la wa ni bag gi skad 'byin la/ /ma he dag ni stag gi skad 'byin kyang / /'jig rten mkhas pa bar chad bya ma nus/ /de bzhin
223b6(mdo sde): phyugs kyi kha nas mtha' yas pa/ /rnam pa bye ba sems can skad 'byin kyang / /rnam 'dren de ni gtse bar ma nus shing / /bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /stag ni ri
223b7(mdo sde): dwags khyu mchog skad 'byin cing / /de bzhin bong bu'i skad dang rta yi skad/ /de tshe dom ni seng+ge'i skad 'byin kyang / /'jig rten phan mdzad pa spu'i khung ma g.yos/ /dred
224a1(mdo sde): ni nam mkha' lding gi skad 'byin cing / /de tshe de bzhin glang po rta skad 'byin/ /rnam 'dren de ni gtses par ma nus shing / /bar chad bya ba dag
224a2(mdo sde): tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /nam mkha' lding ni khu byug skad 'byin cing / /de bzhin ne tso phyugs gzhon skad 'byin la/ /ne tso'i skad ni yang dag skad 'byin byed/ /
224a3(mdo sde): shang shang te'u'i skad rnams 'byin par byed/ /de tshe ka la ping+ka'i yang dag skad/ /de tshe mtshan mo gang la zhe sa'i skad/ /de tshe nyams su dga' ba rma bya'i skad/ /de
224a4(mdo sde): bzhin tsan tsa'i skad dang shugs kyi skad/ /phyugs gzhon zhe sa'i skad dag 'byin par byed/ /de tshe ka la ping+ka yid 'ong dga'/ /ko ka'i tshig rtsub dag ni 'byin byed
224a5(mdo sde): kyang / /rgyal ba'i thugs ni gzhan du ma gyur to/ /sbrul ni glang po'i skad dag 'byin byed cing / /de bzhin glang po sbrul gyi skad 'byin kyang / /rnam 'dren de la gtso bar
224a6(mdo sde): ma nus shing / /bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /de tshe ngang pa seng+ge'i skad 'byin cing / /de bzhin khyim bya khra yi skad 'byin kyang / /rnam 'dren de la gtse bar bya
224a7(mdo sde): ma nus| |bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /rta ni dre'u'i skad dag 'byin byed cing / /de bzhin tsan tsa go bo'i skad 'byin kyang / /rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma
224b1(mdo sde): nus shing / /bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /glang po 'ug pa tsan tsa'i skad 'byin cing / /bya dang khyu mchog skad 'byin khrung khrung skad/ /de tshe bya rgod dzim+ha'i skad 'byin
224b2(mdo sde): cing / /bya dang khyu mchog b+he ri'i skad 'byin la/ /ngang pa'i kha nas skad rnams thams cad 'byin/ /de bzhin khu byug gnod sbyin kun gyi skad/ /de tshe grul bum thams cad skad
224b3(mdo sde): 'byin cing / /de bzhin kha cig nas ni skad kun 'byin/ /kha yi rnam pa de las de skad 'byin/ /skad cig tu ni mtha' yas skad 'byin kyang / /rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus
224b4(mdo sde): shing / /bar chad byed pa dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /klu yi kha nas rdo yi char 'bebs shing / /de bzhin mtshon cha drag po'i char 'bebs kyang / /rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma
224b5(mdo sde): nus shing / /bar chad byed pa dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /gnod sbyin kha nas rdo yi char 'bebs shing / /de bzhin me rab 'bar ba'i char 'bebs la/ /de bzhin ri dang
224b6(mdo sde): phyag dar char 'bebs kyang / /bde gshegs bar chad bya bar ma nus so/ /grul bum mda' yi char dang de bzhin du/ /me 'bar dang ni mtshon cha'i char 'bebs
224b7(mdo sde): kyang / /rnam 'dren de la gtso bar ma nus shing / /bar chad byed pa dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /de tshe bdud ni sdig can nga yis su/ /shin tu mi bzad rnam par gces
225a1(mdo sde): byas kyang / /brtson 'grus dpag med stobs ni bskyed nas su/ /bdud stobs bsten pa byang chub rtogs par chud/ /rang byung gis ni bdud
225a2(mdo sde): sde dpa' bkong zhing / /ljon mchog drung du skyil mo dbyer med bcas/ /sbun pa rlung gis 'phyar ltar bcom nas su/ /byang chub mchog reg skye rgu thugs su chud/ /
225a3(mdo sde): de tshes ni rnam drug rab g.yos shing / /bsnyen par dka' ba'i sde de phyogs tshol to/ /rlung gi rgyal pos bya ni khyer ba ltar/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gzi yis rnam par
225a4(mdo sde): bcom| |klu dang gnod sbyin srin po de dag gis/ /de tshe sna tshogs gdong ni mngon par sprul/ /de dag bdud bsten pa yi gzi brjid kyis/ /kha ni bye ba yod pa de dag
225a5(mdo sde): bcom| |ji ltar nga yis bdud kyi bu mo bcom/ /bud med 'di dag bdag gis der rgas gnas/ /de bzhin bdud stobs bsnyen dka' rang gis sprul/ /bdud stobs
225a6(mdo sde): bsten pa'i mthu yis bcom par gyur/ /bde gshegs mchog la lha yis bu sprul bkang / /'jig rten rnam par 'dren pas zil gyis mnan/ /lha yi bu mo khri
225a7(mdo sde): phrag brgyad cu kun/ /bdud bsten pas ni byang chub dag la btsud/ /rnam par btul cing byang chub mi g.yo gnas/ /de tshe bsten par dka' ba sdug bsngal gyur/ /
225b1(mdo sde): de yi tshe na bdud bsten byung nas su/ /'gro ba de dag bdag las grol bar byas/ /de ltar nga yis brtson 'grus bskyed pas su/ /de tshe thub par dka' ba'i bdud las rgyal/ /
225b2(mdo sde): rdul bral zhi mchog byang chub tshol ba na/ nga yi sras kyis de ltar bslab par bya/ /sems can bye ba mang po'i don bya zhing / /nam yang bdag gi phyir ni bde mi bya/ /ji ltar
225b3(mdo sde): mgo la me 'bar gzhan mi sems/ /skyes bu'i zhi bya lta bur brtson 'grus bskyed/ /de ltar zhi ba mchog dag tshol ba na/ /yid kyis yid kyis rnam par bsam par byos/ /de
225b4(mdo sde): nas klu'i rgyal po zla ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ mi dang lha yi ston pa kha lo sgyur/ /lha dang bcas pa 'gro 'di'i 'dren pa
225b5(mdo sde): ste| |ji ltar bde gshegs bdag 'khrungs dran ldan pa/ /bla med byang chub thob pa bdag gis zhu/ /'dren pa thub pas 'dir ni sred las rgyal/ /ji ltar 'dren pa bde
225b6(mdo sde): gshegs bdag la 'khrungs/ /bdud ni rmongs mdzad mya ngan 'das reg pa/ /rgyal ba gang zag mchog gi lung bstan pa/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag la dran bsdams na/ /
225b7(mdo sde): nyes bcas 'khor ba'i 'gro ba 'gag par 'gyur/ /skye bo mi mkhas gang la chags gyur pa/ /bde ba rab tu mi shes sdug bsngal reg /dran pa nyams pa 'khor ba de dang
226a1(mdo sde): der| |mi mkhas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su dran/ /rmongs pa de ni thar pa'i 'gro mi shes/ /nyon mongs bdud kyi spyod yul dag la
226a2(mdo sde): dga'| |log pa rnam par nyams pa'i yid kyis su/ /mi rtag rtag dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang / /bdag med bdag dang mi gtsang gtsang 'dzin pa/ /nyon mongs bdud
226a3(mdo sde): kyi yul las mi 'grol lo/ /rab nyams de dag gis ni 'gro ba shes/ /dran pa nyer gzhag lam ni rab tu shes/ /spyad pa spyod tshe 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub
226a4(mdo sde): byed pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa klus thos nas/ /byang chub gzhal du med la 'dun pa bskyed/ /klu chen zla bas mi 'dul kha lo sgyur/ /dran pa
226a5(mdo sde): nye bar gzhag pa rgyal la bstod/ /dran pa nyams pa'i 'gro ba 'dren pa lags/ /dran stobs shin tu gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub gzhal du med par 'dun
226a6(mdo sde): pa bskyed/ /dran pa nyams pa med pa'i 'gro ba bstan/ /byang chub gzhal du med la 'dun pa bskyed/ /byang chub dran ldan gnas la reg par bgyi/ /bdud stongs bdud
226a7(mdo sde): dpung bcas gzhom spang bya zhing / /bdud kyis dam du bcings pa'i sems can dgrol/ /rgyal ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mkhyen/ /klu de'i bsam pa thugs su chud
226b1(mdo sde): nas su| |sems can phan phyir klu chen zla ba ni/ /'dren pas gzhal med byang chub lung bstan pa/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu la/ /klu bdag de yis sngon ni bsnyen
226b2(mdo sde): bkur byas/ /'di nas phyis ni sangs rgyas bye ba bcu/ /byang chub zhi ba tshol tshe mchod pa byed/ /phyi nas de ni gzhal med byang chub reg /rgyal ba'i mtshan ni zla bzang zhes bya
226b3(mdo sde): ste| |bdud kyi stobs ni shin tu stobs nyams byed/ /bdud kyi stobs ni rgyal ba'i stobs byed 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni legs gsungs 'di thos nas/ /klu ni bye ba
226b4(mdo sde): byang chub mchog la gnas/ /sngon med byang chub la ni yid zhugs te/ /sangs rgyas legs par gsungs la'ang mngon par dga'/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po tshogs byed
226b5(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ rgyal ba nyid 'khrungs yang dag 'du gyur pa/ /ma 'khrul sems kyis spyad pa spyod pa na/ /bdud
226b6(mdo sde): kyi stobs bcas dpung bcas bcom nas su/ /bla med byang chub zhi ba ji ltar 'thob/ /bde pa'i sems ni g.yo bar mi bya zhing / /nyon mongs bdud kyi stobs ni rnam
226b7(mdo sde): par spang / /mnyam gzhag rgyal ba'i spyad pa spyod byed pa/ /de ni myur du byang chub zhi 'thob 'gyur/ /lung bstan pas ni klu de dag 'gyur nas/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub la ni
227a1(mdo sde): yid 'jug cing / /mnyam gzhag bdud kyi spyod yul las ni 'byung / /'dren la bsam gtan tshul gyis mngon bstod pa/ /spyod yul dang ni
227a2(mdo sde): spyod yul ma yin mkhyen/ /gang dag 'jig rten 'dren pa khyod kyis bslab/ /'gro ba de dag bdud kyi spyod las thar/ /chags med thugs kyis dgongs la phyag 'tshal lo//
227a3(mdo sde): de ring slan chad rgyal ba'i spyod yul la/ /spyad par bgyi zhing bdud kyi spyod yul spang / /bdud kyi spyod yul las ni 'gro ba dgrol/ /bde gshegs spyod yul la ni
227a4(mdo sde): yang dag dgod/ /gang zag mchog gis klu yi bdag po yi/ /bsam pa mkhyen nas byang chub lung bstan pa/ /gang dag nyon mongs bdud kyi yul la brten/ /bye ba tha ma
227a5(mdo sde): pa'i klu ni yang dag gnas/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po shugs 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ mi dag 'di ru shes rab
227a6(mdo sde): la spyod pa/ /'dod la chags med spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /bdud kyi stobs bcus dpung bcas bcom nas su/ /byang chub gzhal med nyes med ji ltar 'thob/ /'gro
227a7(mdo sde): kun sgyu ma 'dra bar rnam shes pa/ /de ni bdud kyi zhags pas 'ching mi byed/ /'gro ba 'di dag bdud kyis bcings mthong nas/ /snying rje bskyed de dka' thub mchog
227b1(mdo sde): la spyod| |ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dag 'gyur nas/ /gzhal du med pa'i dga' bas sems rangs te/ /rgyal ba thub la mkhyen pas bstod nas su/ /byang chub gzhol ba la ni
227b2(mdo sde): yid bskyod do/ /klu yi bdag po'i bsam pa thugs chud nas/ /'dren pas byang chub mchog la lung bstan to/ /klu ni bye ba byang chub mchog la gnas/ /'jig rten mkhas pas byang
227b3(mdo sde): chub de lung bstan/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ 'dren pa thabs la mkhas pa bdag la gsungs//
227b4(mdo sde): thabs gang gis ni spyod pa spyad bgyis na/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub las mi ldog/ /mi mchog 'di dag bdag la bka' stsol cig /ji ltar yid ni bar du mi ldog pa/ /bde
227b5(mdo sde): gshegs gang zag mchog ni khyod las su/ /gang dag thos nas thabs mkhas mnyam par rtsom/ /spyad pa spyod pa rnams ni skyo mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba mi mkhas lam ngan zhugs
227b6(mdo sde): pa yi| |'gro ba rnam par nyams la snying rje bskyed/ /'gro la phan phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos/ /bdag nyid yongs su btang ste tshol bar byed/ /chos rnams kyi ni ngo bo
227b7(mdo sde): shes pa na/ /bdag nyid gtong la zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos ni g.yo ba med par shes pa na/ /de bzhin sems can rnams la rab tu ston/ /chung ma bu dang bu mo bdag
228a1(mdo sde): nyid kyi/ /mgo yang yongs su gtong la mi zhum mo/ /de ni gang du'ang gnas par mi 'jig ste/ /bdag med 'du shes kyis ni yid la gnas/ /de ni phung po
228a2(mdo sde): bdag med rab tu ston/ /zang zing med pa'i bde ba mchog 'thob bo/ /de tshe sems can bye ba dpag med dag /smin par byed la dga' zhing zhum pa med/ /ston pa'i gsung
228a3(mdo sde): gis klu de mgu gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas la ni snying nas skyabs song zhing / /byang chub gzhol la yid ni bskyed pa dang / /'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/ /de
228a4(mdo sde): nas klu'i rgyal po bzung bar dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ bde gshegs khyod sras ji ltar spyad bgyis na/ /sangs
228a5(mdo sde): rgyas byang chub bde bas sgrub par bgyid/ /ji ltar thub pa gshegs ltar myur du mchi/ /dpag med gshegs pa de dag bdag la gsungs/ /rgyal ba mi mchog rang byung
228a6(mdo sde): mkhyen pas su/ /byang chub nges la de ni lung bstan pa/ /ji ltar rigs su byang chub spyod pa na/ /nam yang 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnams mi reg /byams pa'i stobs kyis
228a7(mdo sde): phan par spyod pa na/ /byams pa'i sems ni gar yang mi rmongs so/ /byams pa la ni sdug bsngal mi 'byung zhing / /nyes pa rab zhi spyod pa mi g.yo'o/ /spyod tshe sems
228b1(mdo sde): can kun la rab tu ston/ /byams pa sgoms shig gar yang ma g.yo zhig /rab tu zhi ba'i yid kyis nyes pa chom/ /sems can rnams la phan phyir zhi ba btsal/ /de yis legs
228b2(mdo sde): pa'i las de byas pas na/ /spyad pa spyod tshe sdug bsngal mi 'thob cing / /gzhal med byang chub myur du gso bar byed/ /de yi 'khor ni thams cad mthun par 'gyur/ /ston pa'i
228b3(mdo sde): gsung gis klu de dag 'gyur nas/ /shin tu zhi ba'i yid kyis nyes pa spangs/ /byams pa'i sems kyis nyes pa rnam par btul/ /byang chub gzhol ba la ni yid bskyed do//
228b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba snga phyi mkhas pas de'i bsam pa/ /rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis nyon mongs btul/ /yongs su dag la shin tu gnas mkhyen nas/ /byang chub mchog la klu ni lung bstan
228b5(mdo sde): pa| |bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya de cu ru/ /byams pa bsten nas ma 'ongs dus su ni/ /rgyal ba thugs dag ces bya dbang po btul/ /lha dang mi dag gis ni mchod par 'gyur/ /
228b6(mdo sde): mchog tu dga' ba rab tu ma gu sems kyis/ /rgyal ba'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di yis rgyal ba bstod/ /rab tu thugs dag nongs pa shin
228b7(mdo sde): tu btul/ /gti mug rnam par bcom zhing bdud las rgyal/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i thugs rje can/ /nyes ba'i dug spangs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal
229a1(mdo sde): po thams cad rgyags pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na thabs gang gis/ /bdud
229a2(mdo sde): kyi spyod yul dbang du mi 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni bsrungs 'gyur ba/ /bde gshegs thub chen sangs rgyas la zhu'o/ /rgyal bas de yi bsam pa mkhyen pa na/ /
229a3(mdo sde): chags med ye shes kun tu spyan mnga' ba/ /bsod nams brgya mtshan phan pa'i thugs rje can/ /sangs rgyas stobs la mkhas pas lung bstan pa/ /rtag tu de ni dran pa nyer
229a4(mdo sde): bzhag na/ /nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang du bya ba med/ /rtag tu rnam dag sems kyis dran spyod na/ /des na bdud kyi dbang du de mi 'khrid/ /rgyal bas legs gsungs tshig de thos
229a5(mdo sde): nas su| |ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /rab tu sems dang tshig ni gtsang ba dang / /ma smad pa yis bde gshegs mngon par bstod/ /srid pa'i skye la rgyal ba thugs
229a6(mdo sde): brtse ldan/ /sems can lam ngan rab zhugs gzigs nas su/ /the tshom sel cing yongs su dgyes thugs kyis/ /rgyal bas bstan pa'i lam la sems can rnams/ /khyod
229a7(mdo sde): kyis legs gsungs chig ni thos nas su/ /rgyal ba'i chos btsal spyod ba spyad par bgyi/ /bdud kyi stobs bcas dpung bcas bcom nas su/ /sdug bsngal chos dgrol
229b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po char chen po spyod pa zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /skye rgu dag la byams thugs
229b2(mdo sde): skyabs kyi mchog / kun tu spyan mnga' rgyal mchog thugs rje can/ /rdul bral byang chub la ni ji ltar spyad/ /stobs bcu ye shes phung po khyod la zhu/ /'jig rten mgon po bdag gi the
229b3(mdo sde): tshom khum/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rnam par mkhyen/ /bde bar gshegs pas klu de dga' gyur nas/ /rang sems shes par bya phyir brtson 'grus brtan/ /ji ltar bde bar
229b4(mdo sde): gshegs pas bstan ltar bslab/ /rang sems shes par bya phyir nges par gyur/ /rgyal bas bstan pa'i lam ni thos nas 'dug /yongs su mgu ba'i yid kyis the tshom
229b5(mdo sde): bsal| |dga' bas sa la pus mo btsugs nas su/ /rnam 'dren 'jig rten phan mdzad mngon bstod pa/ /nyon mongs thams cad bsal ba bla na med/ /khyod 'dra ma mchis
229b6(mdo sde): gong na ga la mchis/ /ma smad sems can yid ni dga' bar mdzad/ /bde gshegs byang chub mi zad phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po de dag thams
229b7(mdo sde): cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen/ las kyang mkhyen/ smon lam dag kyang mkhyen te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don chen po mdzad nas dge slong rnams
230a1(mdo sde): la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ltos shig /klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa las 'dul ba thos nas 'dul ba'i rtags
230a2(mdo sde): dag ston par byed/ rjes su chags pa'i rtags dag ston par byed/ rjes su 'dzin pa'i rtags dag ston par byed/ 'dren pa'i rtags dag ston par byed/ rnam par 'dren
230a3(mdo sde): pa'i rtags dag ston par byed/ mur byed pa'i rtags dag ston par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
230a4(mdo sde): sems bskyed do/ /klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi don byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya
230a5(mdo sde): ngan las 'da'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi
230a6(mdo sde): las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen nas bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul chen po'i bar dang / bcom ldan 'das gzi brjid chen
230a7(mdo sde): po'i bar dag ngo mtshar che lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phrin las rnam par smin pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das gnas mkhyen pa grub lags/ bcom ldan
230b1(mdo sde): 'das| sems can thams cad la thugs brtse bar dgongs te lung bstan du gsol/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
230b2(mdo sde): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes pas spyad pa spyod par 'gyur lags so/ /de skad
230b3(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ /legs so/ /legs so/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ khyod gang
230b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni/ maud+gal gyi bu/ khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
230b5(mdo sde): skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni/ legs so/ /maud+gal gyi
230b6(mdo sde): bu| de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas bshad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so/ /zhes gsol
230b7(mdo sde): te| bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ nga gnas shes par bya ba'i don du 'das pa'i dus kyi
231a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa dag la bsnyen bkur byas te yongs su zhus so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
231a2(mdo sde): pa de dag gi rnam grangs des na/ maud+gal gyi bu/ khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ maud+gal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
231a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog 'dzin ces bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba bla na
231a4(mdo sde): med pa| lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me
231a5(mdo sde): tog 'dzin de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug byung ngo / /de'i tshe bram ze ut+pa la'i mig ces bya ba shing sA la chen po lta bu zhig kyang byung ste/ de bcom ldan
231a6(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'dzin nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gtsug lag khang dbul ba phul nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
231a7(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i gnas bgyi ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gnas shes pa thob par gyur cig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
231b1(mdo sde): me tog 'dzin pa des nga la legs so/ /zhes bya ba rjes su gnang ste/ ut+pa la'i mig /legs so/ /legs so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ut+pa la'i mig khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
231b2(mdo sde): gnas shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas shes pa thob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /bsam
231b3(mdo sde): gtan pa yi gnas byas shing / /gtsug lag khang ni phul ba yi/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis na/ /ngas ni gnas kyi shes pa bsgrubs/ /ngas dge ba'i rtsa ba de bskyed nas 'di ltar
231b4(mdo sde): sems bskyed de/ sems can gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na gnas shes pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dag thams cad kyi bsod
231b5(mdo sde): nams la rjes su yi rang ste/ ngas rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas
231b6(mdo sde): shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa 'grub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gnas ni shes par bya ba'i phyir/ /gang
231b7(mdo sde): dag g.yel ba med spyod pa/ /de yi spyod la rjes yi rang / /nga'i sems rnam par ma g.yos shing / /dge la rjes su yi rang ste/ /mi dbang de yi spyod pa la/ /bsam pas
232a1(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang nas/ /ngas ni de ltar kun 'byung grub/ /nga rtag par rgyun du khams gsum la ma chags pa'i yid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par
232a2(mdo sde): 'dus byas pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ste/ de dag gi rnam par smin pa la the tshom med pa'i dge ba'i rtsab des nga gnas shes pa 'gog pa shes pa thugs su chud do/ /lam
232a3(mdo sde): de'ang brtson 'grus brtsams pas thugs su chud kyi/ le los ni/ ma yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa thugs su chud do/ /
232a4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gnas dang kun 'byung shes pa dang / /de bzhin 'gog pa dag la yang / /lam gang gis
232a5(mdo sde): ni de 'thob pa/ /rkang gnyis mchog ni de mkhyen to/ /shes pa de dang ldan pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/ /'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'dren pas
232a6(mdo sde): de ni grol bar byed/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ nga gnas ma yin pa shes par bya ba'i don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa dag bskyed de/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das
232a7(mdo sde): pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas par spyod pa zhes bya ba ston pa 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas par
232b1(mdo sde): spyod pa de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gcig ni/ drug khri brgyad stong byung ngo / /de'i tshe na khyim bdag thos spyod ces bya ba zhig kyang byung ste/ des de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas par spyod
232b2(mdo sde): pa de'i yo byad thams cad sbyar nas smon lam 'di skad btab bo/ /bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mi gnas pa'i chos thob par gyur cig ces btab ste/ de'i rgyur byas pa'i chos
232b3(mdo sde): gang la'ang smon lam ma btab bo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa des pa srid pa dang / 'gro ba dang / 'chi ba dang / skye ba thams cad la gang gi gzhi'i gnas ldog
232b4(mdo sde): pa ni| nga la med de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa thugs su chud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /rten
232b5(mdo sde): pa med pa sems kyis su/ /tshul khrims bzod pa'i stobs la brten/ /gang gis 'gro ba spungs byas pa/ /gnas ma yin gyi shes pa thob/ /ngas sems can dpag tu med pa dag
232b6(mdo sde): gnas ma yin pa shes pa la btsud cing dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang bskyed la/ nga dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la'ang gus par rjes su yi rang ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes
232b7(mdo sde): pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa mngon par grub bo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma gtogs par phung po dag mngon par
233a1(mdo sde): 'grub par byed par gang yang ma bsngos so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa mngon par grub bo/ /nga lam gyi shes pa
233a2(mdo sde): 'di bsgrub pa'i don du 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa dag mngon par 'dus byas pa ni/ maud+gal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor pa dpag tu med pa na
233a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa zug rdu 'byin ces bya ba 'jig rten tu byung ste/ de'i nyan thos 'bum tshang bar byung ngo / /de'i tshe dbang pos byin zhes bya ba bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu
233a4(mdo sde): zhig kyang byung ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa zug rdul 'byin pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i yo byad thams cad lo khrir sbyar to/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
233a5(mdo sde): dbang pos byin zhes bya ba bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bur gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nga bram ze dbang pos byin
233a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba shing sA la chen po lta bur gyur to/ /maud+gal gyi bu chen po/ de lta bas na/ gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub
233a7(mdo sde): sems dpas dge ba mngon par 'dus byas te/ bag yod pas gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur pa'i lam shes par yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /maud+gal gyi bu/
233b1(mdo sde): gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yang dag par blang ba la kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du
233b2(mdo sde): mdzad do/ /de las kyi rnam par smin pa des zhabs shin tu brtan par gnas te/ sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mnga' bar gyur/ phyag bzang zhing dpe byad mnga' bar gyur cing /
233b3(mdo sde): gnas ma yin pa shes pa'ang brnyes so/ /lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yang dag par blang ba de la skye bo mang po yang dag par 'dzin du btsug ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas
233b4(mdo sde): ma yin pa shes pa kun 'byung ba brnyes so/ /bam po bcu gsum pa/ ngas lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yang dag par blang pa de'i bsngags pa brjod
233b5(mdo sde): de| de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa brnyes so/ /lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yang dag par blang ba de la ngas skye bo'i
233b6(mdo sde): tshogs mang po rab tu bkod de/ las kyi rnam par smin pa des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa brnyes so/ /ngas phyir mi 'phrog pa'ang thugs
233b7(mdo sde): su chud de/ maud+gal gyi bu/ nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad par spyod pa na dam bcas pa las nam yang 'gal bar ma byas te/ ngas ji ltar dam bcas pa de ltar byas so/ /
234a1(mdo sde): maud+gal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na rgyal po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba gdugs gcig pa/ sa rnams kyi
234a2(mdo sde): dbang phyug/ sbyin pa po/ sbyin bdag dam bcas par don yod par byed pa/ /dam bcas pa las mi 'da' ba zhig byung ngo / /de'i tshe bram ze tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya ba zhig
234a3(mdo sde): rgyal po dpal gyi snying po ga la pa der song ste phyin nas rgyal po zhes brjod de tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis blangs pa/ /sa dbang dpal gyi snying po rgyal par spyan//
234a4(mdo sde): yon tan ldan pas rgya mtsho sar bcas skyongs/ /bdag gis mchis brang du ni sras mo stsol/ /bdag slong 'bras bu yod par rgyal pos mdzod/ /bram ze de dka'
234a5(mdo sde): thub spyod pa yin te/ bdag lus shin tu skem la skra ser/ so mi sdug cing dkar la gtsigs pa/ /shel gyi mig la blta na mi bzad cing / ral pa'i thor chugs can
234a6(mdo sde): d e mthong nas rgyal po de 'jigs shing skrag la mi dga' ste ba spu'i khung bu zing zhes byed par 'gyur pa nas 'jigs par sems pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i bar du gyur
234a7(mdo sde): te/ gal te bu mo 'di ma byin na/ de bdag la dmod pa byed par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bkur sti bya ba yin te/ bdag gis
234b1(mdo sde): dam bcas pa dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /bu mo de yul gyi bzang mo zhes bya ste/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ rgyal po'i khyad par du 'phags
234b2(mdo sde): pa'i tshul thams cad dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyur to/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar de ltar
234b3(mdo sde): bdag gis dam bcas na/ drang srong 'di ni/ gzugs mi sdug la/ bdag gi bu mo 'di ni/ mchog tu gzugs bzang ba yin te/ 'di ltar de'i bdag por mi dga' bar 'gyur
234b4(mdo sde): bas dam bcas pa gzhig par bya'o/ /snyam ste/ de sems pa 'di la zhugs nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /de nas bu mo yul gyi bzang mo des pha de la tshigs su
234b5(mdo sde): bcad de smras pa/ yab cig dgongs shing shin tu dgongs par mdzod/ /bram ze'i tshig las 'gal bar ma mdzad cig /'di 'dra'i las kyis bdag bskyed yab yum
234b6(mdo sde): la'ang / /dbang mi mnga' bas khyim thab de stsol cig /de nas rgyal po dpal gyi snying po bu mo de'i tshig thos nas mgu zhing dga' la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing bde
234b7(mdo sde): ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bu mo yul gyi bzang mo de bram ze de la byin no/ /de nas bram ze des bu mo de blangs nas song ste bu bskyed nas chung ma dang bu bzhag ste yang rab
235a1(mdo sde): tu byung ngo / /rgyal po des bram ze de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang brtul
235a2(mdo sde): zhugs 'dra bar skyes te/ de 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug gi tshe'i tshad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas mir skyes pa na phyir mi 'phrog pa'i chos thams cad thob bo/ /
235a3(mdo sde): maud+gal gyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba de gzhan ma yin te/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /dge ba'i rtsa
235a4(mdo sde): ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa thob cing bdud kyi zhags pa thams cad kyis kyang phyir mi 'phrog go / maud+gal gyi bu/ des na/ nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
235a5(mdo sde): p a spyod pa na sems can dpag tu med pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa'i dge ba rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa thob
235a6(mdo sde): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i rnam par smin pa la the tshom med de/ de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa thugs su chud/ mtshan
235a7(mdo sde): dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa'ang brnyes so/ /ngas gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag mngon par 'dus byas te sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la bcug pa
235b1(mdo sde): des nga rab tu dga' ba gzhal du med pa skyes te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur pa'i lam shes pa thob ste/ shes pa gang dang ldan pas
235b2(mdo sde): bdag dang sems can rnams kyi gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa so sor shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
235b3(mdo sde): 'di dag gsungs so/ /gnas ma yin pa shes pa rgyur bcas dang / /de bzhin 'gog dang lam dang sems can gyi/ /spyod dang bsam pa nges par de yi mthus/ /ngas ni brtag
235b4(mdo sde): dang dpyod pa kun tu shes/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na rtag par rab tu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rgyur te
235b5(mdo sde): dran pa'i dbang po gang gis nga shin tu nye bar gnas pas yun ring por byas pa dang / yun ring por bshad pa brjod de/ maud+gal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag
235b6(mdo sde): tu med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs sgrog bla ma zhes bya ba nas rgya cher sbyar te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa
235b7(mdo sde): 'jigs sgrog bla ma de'i rim gro ba dge slong yid du 'ong zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de la bye ba phrag drag cur de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs sgrog bla ma de'i rim gro pa byas shing yid du
236a1(mdo sde): 'ong ste| yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pas bshad pa'ang 'dzin la/ rang gi don kyang mi gtong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig po de la
236a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas khri nyis stong byung ste/ de dag thams cad kyi rim gro par yang dge slong yid 'ong de gyur to/ /de ltar phyis de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi shugs brnyes zhes
236a3(mdo sde): bya ba byung ste/ de'i rim gro par yang dge slong yid 'ong de gyur te/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba des lha dang mi rnams su skyes so/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong yid 'ong
236a4(mdo sde): zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na/ de ltar mi blta ste/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong yid 'ong zhes bya bar gyur to/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga 'das pa shes pa
236a5(mdo sde): thob cing / dran pa shes pa de ngas skye bo mang po yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing / gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la'ang yid dga' bas rjes su yid rangs te/ dge ba'i
236a6(mdo sde): rtsa ba des nga 'das pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa brnyes so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang shes pa de'ang shes pa gang gis yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'das
236a7(mdo sde): pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa mngon sum du byas/ thabs gang gis nga spyad pa spyod pa na de skye bo'i tshogs mang po shes pa de la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
236b1(mdo sde): des nga 'das pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa brnyes so/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ nga ma 'ongs pa shes par bya ba'i don du sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
236b2(mdo sde): dka' ba mang po byas te/ gtang bar dka' ba btang nas ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bdag sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong bar gyur cig snyam mo/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba
236b3(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gsal ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gsal
236b4(mdo sde): ba'i sgron ma de'i 'khor nyan thos 'bum byung ngo / /de ma 'ongs pa'i dus las brtsams nyan thos rnams la chos ston pa de'i tshe dge slong rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom pa
236b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba de'i 'khor nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye e ma bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang ldan par
236b6(mdo sde): gyur cig snyam nas de de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gsal ba'i sgron ma de la gser gyi me tog chen po mngon par gtor te smon lam btab pa/ kye e ma bdag ma 'ongs
236b7(mdo sde): pa'i dus na 'di lta bu'i ye shes skye bar gyur cig ces btab ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga ma 'ongs pa shes pa brnyes so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des kyang nga rten cing 'brel par
237a1(mdo sde): 'byung ba mkhyen te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga ma 'ongs pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa brnyes so/ /rgyu dang rkyen gang zhig yod na/ ma 'ongs pa
237a2(mdo sde): shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub kyi/ de'i rgyu med na/ de lta bu rab tu shes par mi 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga ma 'ongs pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa
237a3(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so/ /nga mchog tu dga' ba gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la bstan te/ shes pa de mngon par dga' zhing yongs
237a4(mdo sde): su dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas nga ma 'ongs pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa brnyes so/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ gzhan yang da ltar byung ba'i shes pa
237a5(mdo sde): bsgrub pa'i don du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dag mngon par 'dus byas te/ maud+gal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa'i pha
237a6(mdo sde): r ol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas spyan zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar 'jig rten du
237a7(mdo sde): byung ste| de 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa la da ltar byung ba'i dus las brtsams te chos ston to/ /de'i tshe bram ze blo ldan zhes bya
237b1(mdo sde): ba shing sA la chen po lta bu zhig kyang de'i 'khor nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spobs pa thogs pa med pas da ltar gyi dus las brtsams nas chos ston pa
237b2(mdo sde): bram ze blo ldan shing sA la chen po lta bus thos so/ /thos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung nas ngo mtshar du bya ba gzhal du med pa zhig skyes par gyur te/ 'di ltar de
237b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas da ltar byung ba'i dus las brtsams nas spobs pa thogs pa med pas chos ston pa 'di ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /'di ni/ rmad du byung ba'o/ /snyam mo/ /de
237b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung nas ngo mtshar du bya ba thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la rin po che'i me tog gtor te smon lam btab pa/ kye e ma bdag bla na med pa yang
237b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas spobs pa thogs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston par gyur cig ces btab ste/ de las kyi rnam
237b6(mdo sde): par smin pa des bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyad cur log par ltung bar ma song ngo / /maud+gal gyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze blo ldan shing sA la chen po lta bur gyur pa de gzhan yin
237b7(mdo sde): par sems na/ khyod kyis de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze blo ldan shing sA la chen po lta bur gyur to/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga da ltar byung ba'i dus la sgrib
238a1(mdo sde): pa med pa'i ye shes skyes te/ ngas da ltar byung ba'i shes pa de la skye bo'i tshogs mang po btsud do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des ngad ltar byung ba shes
