499b5(mdo sde): mi ston pa ma yin/ 'bras bu thob pa ma yin/ 'bras bu ma thob pa ma yin/ rtog pa ma yin/ rtog pa med pa ma yin/ rtog pa dang bral ba ma yin/ rtog pa dang ma bral ba ma yin
499b6(mdo sde): mod kyi/ 'jam dpal/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes kyi 'od zer dag ni/ khams gsum po de dag tu chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa
499b7(mdo sde): dag la thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dag gtong bar mdzad cing / ye shes kyi 'od zer btang ba dag gis kyang dang po kho nar byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam
500a1(mdo sde): pa'i ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po chen po lta bu dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag
500a2(mdo sde): bar zhugs pa rnams kyi lus la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi lus la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu
500a3(mdo sde): sems can lhag pa'i bsam pa dge ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil
500a4(mdo sde): 'khor gyi ye shes kyi 'od zer dag than sems can log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus la 'bab par 'gyur zhing / de dag la ma 'ongs
500a5(mdo sde): pa'i rgyu yang dag par skyed pas phan 'dogs pa dang / dge ba'i chos rnams kyis yang dag par 'phel bar yang byed do/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ de
500a6(mdo sde): dag la 'ang thams cad du mnyam zhing btang snyoms la rnam par mi rtog cid bye brag mi 'byed de/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ye
500a7(mdo sde): shes kyi 'od zer ni/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can 'di la ni/ chos rgya chen po bstan par bya'o/ /'di la ni/ bstan par mi bya'o/ /snyam du'ang mi sems la/ 'di
500b1(mdo sde): snyam du sems can 'di ni/ rgya chen po la mos pa yin no/ /'di ni/ bar ma la mos pa yin no/ /'di ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa yin no/ /'di ni/ bsam
500b2(mdo sde): pa dge ba yin no/ /'di ni/ dman pa dang log pa la mos pa yin no/ /snyam du rnam par rtog par yang mi byed do/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'di snyam
500b3(mdo sde): du| sems can 'di ni/ rgya chen po la mos pa yin gyi/ 'di la ni/ theg pa chen po bstan par bya'o/ /'di ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pa bar ma la mos pa yin gyi/ 'di
500b4(mdo sde): la ni| rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bstan par bya'o/ /'di ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa yin gyi/ 'di la ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa bstan par bya'o/ /sems can
500b5(mdo sde): bsam pa dge ba rnams kyi bsam pa rtogs par byas nas bsam pa rnam par sbyang bar bya'o/ /sems can log pa nyid du mos pa'i bar dag ni/ lta ba drang po bya zhing /
500b6(mdo sde): ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i chos bstan par bya'o/ /snyam du'ang mi sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes kyi 'od zer snang ba ni/ de ltar
500b7(mdo sde): rnam par rtog par mi byed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes kyi 'od zer snang ba ni/ rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang /
501a1(mdo sde): yongs su rtog pa dang / spros pa thams cad yang dag par rgyun chad pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'on kyang sems can rnams
501a2(mdo sde): k yi dge ba'i bsam pa'i rgyud sna tshogs dag la de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi snang ba sna tshogs dag 'byung bar yang 'gyur
501a3(mdo sde): ro| |bam po gnyis pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na nor bu chen po bsam pa thams cad yongs su
501a4(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na de las sems can gang gis bsam pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i sgra 'byung bar sems
501a5(mdo sde): can rnams kyis kun tu shes kyang nor bu rin po che chen po de ni/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ sems par mi byed/ rnam par sems par mi byed
501a6(mdo sde): cing / sems pa med pa/ sems med pa/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba yin no/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
501a7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ sems par mi byed/ rnam par sems par mi byed cing /
501b1(mdo sde): sems pa med pa/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ ma bzung ba/ yongs su gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par bya ba ma
501b2(mdo sde): yin| so so'i bden pa gsal ba/ 'dod chags bsal ba/ zhe sdang bsal ba/ gti mug bsal ba/ bden pa ma yin/ rdzun pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/
501b3(mdo sde): mi rtag pa ma yin/ 'od ma yin/ 'od med pa ma yin/ 'jig rten ma yin/ 'jig rten med pa ma yin/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma

501b5(mdo sde): par zhen par bya ba med pa/ brjod du med pa/ brjod pa yang dag par rgyun chad pa/ kun tu dga' ba med pa/ kun tu dga' ba dang bral ba/ kun tu dga' bas nges par bcom
501b6(mdo sde): pa| grangs su bgrang ba ma yin pa dang / grangs su bgrang ba dang / 'gro ba med pa/ 'gro bar 'gro ba med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par rgyun chad pa/ brjod pa
501b7(mdo sde): thams cad yang dag par rgyun chad pa/ bltar mi snang ba/ mi mthong ba/ gzung du med pa/ tha snyad med pa/ nam mkha' ma yin/ bla gab med pa ma yin/ gzung
502a1(mdo sde): bar mi bya ba ma yin/ bltar snang ba ma yin/ bstan par bya ba ma yin/ tshogs pa med pa ma yin/ brtags pa ma yin/ rnam par
502a2(mdo sde): brtags pa ma yin/ rnam par bsgrubs pa ma yin/ kun tu bstan pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin/ yongs su sbyang bar 'os pa ma yin/ ming
502a3(mdo sde): med pa| gzugs med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ las med pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma
502a4(mdo sde): yin| ci'ang ma yin/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra skad thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ sgra med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan
502a5(mdo sde): nyid thams cad dang bral ba/ nang na mi dmigs /phyi rol na mi dmigs/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs mod kyi/ 'jam dpal/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs
502a6(mdo sde): pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i ye shes rin po che snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ de las sems can gang yin pa de'i bsam pa
502a7(mdo sde): dang mos pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa 'byung bar sems can rnams kyis kun tu shes kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ de dag la'ang thams cad du mnyam
502b1(mdo sde): zhing btang snyoms la rnam par mi rtog cing bye brag mi 'byed do/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ brag ca ni/ gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa las 'byung bar sems can
502b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis kun tu shes kyang de ni/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin/ nang na ma yin/ phyi rol na ma yin/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs
502b3(mdo sde): te| ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ shes pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ shes pa dang mi ldan pa ma yin/ shes rab ma yin/ shes rab med
502b4(mdo sde): pa ma yin/ rig pa ma yin/ rig pa med pa ma yin/ rnam par grol ba ma yin/ rnam par grol ba med pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho
502b5(mdo sde): ba med pa ma yin/ dran pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ dran pa dang mi ldan pa ma yin/ gnas pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ gnas pa dang mi ldan pa ma yin| 'dug pa ma yin/
502b6(mdo sde): mi 'dug pa ma yin/ sa'i khams ma yin/ chu'i khams ma yin/ me'i khams ma yin/ rlung gi khams ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/
502b7(mdo sde): spros pa yod pa ma yin/ spros pa med pa ma yin/ sgra ma yin/ sgra med pa ma yin/ bltar snang ba ma yin/ bltar mi snang ba ma yin/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ sgra
503a1(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das pa/ gzhal du med pa/ gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral
503a2(mdo sde): ba| zhi ba ma yin/ ma zhi ba ma yin/ ring po ma yin/ thung ngu ma yin/ sems pa yod pa ma yin/ sems pa med pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin/ mi snang ba ma
503a3(mdo sde): yin| bstan du yod pa ma yin/ bstan du med pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa ma yin/ dran pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa
503a4(mdo sde): med pa| sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ thams cad du mnyam zhing btang snyoms la rnam par mi rtog cing bye brag mi 'byed pa/ dus
503a5(mdo sde): gsum las yang dag par 'das pa yin mod kyi/ 'jam dpal/ 'on kyang sems can lhag pa'i bsam pa tha dad pa rnams kyi sgra skad dang / rnam par rig pa
503a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs dag las brag ca'i sgra skad sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de kho na bzhin du kun tu shes par
503a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar
503b1(mdo sde): byung ba ma yin/ nang na ma yin/ phyi rol na ma yin zhing / gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs te/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ shes pa
503b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa ma yin/ shes pa dang mi ldan pa ma yin/ shes rab ma yin/ shes rab med pa ma yin/ rig pa ma yin/ rig pa med pa ma yin/ rnam par grol ba ma yin/
503b3(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba med pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa ma yin/ dran pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ dran pa dang mi ldan pa ma yin/ gnas dang ldan pa ma yin/ gnas
503b4(mdo sde): dang mi ldan pa ma yin/ 'dug pa ma yin/ mi 'dug pa ma yin/ sa'i khams ma yin/ chu'i khams ma yin/ me'i khams ma yin/ rlung gi khams ma yin/ 'dus
503b5(mdo sde): byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ spros pa yod pa ma yin/ spros pa med pa ma yin/ sgra ma yin/ sgra med pa ma yin/ bltar snang ba ma yin/ bltar mi snang ba ma

504a1(mdo sde): du yod pa ma yin/ bstan du med pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa/ dran pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med

504a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar kun tu shes par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa la brten cing sa la gnas nas rtswa dang / shing gel pa
504a5(mdo sde): dang / rtsi dang / nags tshal thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur yang 'jam dpal/ sa ni/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed de/
504a6(mdo sde): thams cad du mnyam zhing rnam par mi rtog pa/ bye brag mi 'byed cing sems par mi byed de/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba yin/ 'jam dpal/
504a7(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la brten cing de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas nas sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa
504b1(mdo sde): chen po pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la brten cing de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas nas
504b2(mdo sde): spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs kyi gnas gzhan thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / tha na log pa nyid du nges pa rnams kyi dge ba'i
504b3(mdo sde): rtsa ba gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur mod kyi/ 'jam dpal/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rtog par mi
504b4(mdo sde): byed| rnam par rtog par mi byed de/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang /
504b5(mdo sde): dmigs pa dang yid la byed pa thams cad rgyun chad pa/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ rtog ge ma yin/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin/ mi snang ba/

505b6(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa dang / 'bring dang / mchog tu mthong ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'di snyam du sems can 'di ni/ bsam
505b7(mdo sde): pa dang / mos pa dman pa yin gyi/ sems can 'di la ni/ gzugs kyi sku'i kha dog yongs su 'grub pa dman pa bstan par bya'o/ /sems can 'di ni/ bsam pa
506a1(mdo sde): dang / mos pa 'bring yin gyi/ sems can 'di la ni/ gzugs kyi sku'i kha dog yongs su 'grub pa 'bring bstan par bya'o/ /sems
506a2(mdo sde): can 'di ni/ bsam pa dang mos pa rgya che ba yin gyi/ sems can 'di la ni/ gzugs kyi sku'i kha dog yongs su 'grub pa rgya chen po bstan par bya'o/ /snyam du mi
506a3(mdo sde): sems so/ /'jam dpal/ chos ston pa'ang de bzhin du rtogs par bya ste/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'di snyam du sems can 'di ni/ dman
506a4(mdo sde): pa la mos pa yin gyi/ sems can 'di la ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam dman pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di ni/ bar ma la mos pa yin gyi/ sems
506a5(mdo sde): can 'di la ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam bar ma brjod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di ni/ rgya chen po la mos pa yin gyi/ sems can 'di la ni/ theg pa chen

506a7(mdo sde): gyi| sems can 'di la ni/ sbyin pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di ni/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan la mos
506b1(mdo sde): pa yin gyi/ sems can 'di la ni/ bsam gtan gyi gtam brjod par bya'o/ /snyam du'ang mi sems so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'di
506b2(mdo sde): snyam du sems can 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa yin gyi/ sems can 'di la ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /snyam du'ang
506b3(mdo sde): mi sems te/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni/ rnam par rtog pa de lta bu dag med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ chos kyi

506b7(mdo sde): pa'i mthar nges pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi
507a1(mdo sde): mtha' dang / gnyis su med pa'i mtha' dang / shin tu 'byung ba med pa'i mtha' yin te/ thams cad du mnyam zhing rnam par mi rtog la bye
507a2(mdo sde): brag mi 'byed de/ dman pa ma yin/ bar ma ma yin/ mchog ma yin no/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mnyam zhing rnam par mi rtog la bye
507a3(mdo sde): brag mi 'byed de/ dman pa ma yin/ bar ma ma yin/ mchog ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/
507a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ dmigs su med pa gang yin pa de ni/ mnyam pa nyid yin no/ /mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gnas pa nyid yin no/ /
507a5(mdo sde): gnas pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mi g.yo ba nyid yin no/ /mi g.yo ba nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mi rten pa nyid yin no/ /chos thams cad la/ mi rten pa'i sems kyi
507a6(mdo sde): gnas med do/ /sems mi gnas pa ni/ skye ba med par gyur te/ de ltar mthong ba'i sems dang / sems las byung ba rnams ni/ phyin ci ma log par 'jug par
507a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /gang gis sems phyin ci ma log pa des ni/ ji lta ba bzhin thob par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ba bzhin thob pa ni/ 'phro bar mi byed do/ /spros pa med pa la ni/ spyod pa'ang
507b1(mdo sde): med do| |gang gi tshe spyod par mi byed pa de'i tshe mi 'khor ro/ /gang gi tshe mi 'khor ba de'i tshe rnam par mi 'phro ste/ rnam par 'phro ba med pa ni/ chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do/ /chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba ni/

507b4(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de ni/ shin tu ma skyes pa yin no/ /shin tu ma skyes pa gang yin pa des ni/ nges pa 'thob bo/ /nges pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad yid la
507b5(mdo sde): byed pa dang lhan cig mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe chos thams cad yid la byed pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de'i tshe gnas par bya ba med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe gnas par bya ba
507b6(mdo sde): med pa de'i tshe mi 'byung mi 'jig go / gang gi tshe mi 'byung mi 'jig pa de'i tshe gnas shing chos thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe gnas shing chos thob pa de'i tshe tshul bzhin gyi
507b7(mdo sde): chos la zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul bzhin gyi chos la zhugs pa la ni/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin pa'i chos de 'ga' yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/
508a1(mdo sde): stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub bo/ /des de ltar stong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
508a2(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / gzung ba med pa dang / gzhi med pa rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir byang chub ste/ byang chub ni/
508a3(mdo sde): tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'o/ /tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni/ 'deg pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa dang / bya ba med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la sbyor ba dang /
508a4(mdo sde): chags pa med pa dang / grol ba med pa la sbyor ba dang / gcig pa nyid ma yin pa dang / tha dad pa nyid ma yin pa la sbyor ba dang / 'ongs pa ma yin pa la sbyor ba
508a5(mdo sde): dang / tshul bzhin la sbyor ba yin no/ /tshul bzhin gang yin pa de la ni/ sbyor ba'ang med/ spangs pa'ang med/ 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'ang med do/ de ci'i phyir
508a6(mdo sde): zhe na| 'jam dpal/ sems ni/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir te/ de ni/ glo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis nye bar nyon mongs par zad kyi/
508a7(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid ma yin no/ /rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid gang yin pa de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa nyid ma yin no/ /kun nas
508b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gnyen po gang gis nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i gnyen po med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ dag pa nyid yin pas
508b2(mdo sde): dag pa ni/ dag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba med pa'o/ /skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ ma smad pa'o/ /ma smad pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dod pa
508b3(mdo sde): spangs pa'o/ /'dod pa spangs pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sred pa thams cad 'gag go /gang la sred pa thams cad 'gags pa de ni/ mi skye'o/ /mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni/
508b4(mdo sde): byang chub bo/ /byang chub gang yin pa de ni/ mnyam pa nyid do/ /mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid la ni/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas

508b6(mdo sde): byas kyang med/ 'dus ma byas kyang med/ gnyis su gdags pa'ang med pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do/ /gzhan
508b7(mdo sde): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin nyid do/ /'gyur ba med pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'ong ba med pa de bzhin nyid do/ /'ong ba med pa
509a1(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'gro ba med pa de bzhin nyid do/ /'gro ba med pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ji lta ba bzhin de bzhin nyid do/ /ji lta ba de bzhin nyid gang
509a2(mdo sde): yin pa de ni/ nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin no/ /nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang kun
509a3(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ba de ni/ skye bar mi 'gyur/ 'gag par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang skye bar mi 'gyur/ 'gag par mi 'gyur ba de ni/
509a4(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam mo/ /gang mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa de ni/ 'khor bar mi 'gyur/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang
509a5(mdo sde): 'khor bar mi 'gyur yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba de ni/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no/ /gang 'das pa ma yin/
509a6(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin pa de ni/ dman pa ma yin/ bar ma ma yin/ mchog ma yin no/ /gang dman pa ma yin/ bar ma ma yin/ mchog
509a7(mdo sde): ma yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid de/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de ni/ de kho na'i don gyi tshig bla dwags yin no/ /de kho na zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin nyid kho na'o/ /de bzhin
509b1(mdo sde): nyid de kho na ni/ de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid dang / bdag de ni/ gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /gnyis su byar med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub
509b2(mdo sde): ste| byang chub ni/ don rtogs pa'o/ /don ces bya ba ni/ chos bstan pa thams cad la rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du 'jug pa shes pa'o/ /shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos
509b3(mdo sde): thams cad la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi dbyer med pa'i don de ni/ don ces bya ste/ don ni/ sgra med pa/ brjod du med pa/ tha snyad
509b4(mdo sde): med pa| tha snyad yang dag par chad pa yin no/ /shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ don rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa ste/
509b5(mdo sde): de ni| shes pa zhes bya'o/ /don ces bya ba ni/ de kho na'i don shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pas nges par rtogs pa gang yin pa ste/ de nyid
509b6(mdo sde): chos nyid yin no/ /chos nyid gang yin pa de ni/ don yin no/ /don rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / nges pa'i
509b7(mdo sde): don rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pas rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos nyid do/ /chos nyid gang yin pa de ni/ don yin no/ /don gang yin pa de ni/ chos nyid dang / chos
510a1(mdo sde): gnas pa nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid de/ de ni/ chos la 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos la ma zhugs pa gang yin pa dang / don dang tshig
510a2(mdo sde): 'bru mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gnyis su med pa'i don gyis mnyam pa nyid yin te/ mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ don yin no/ /don shes pa dang / rnam
510a3(mdo sde): par shes pa la mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gnyis su med pa'i sgor 'jug pas na/ shes pa yin no/ /nges pa'i don dang / drang ba'i don mnyam pa nyid kyis
510a4(mdo sde): don mnyam pa de ni/ stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid du don mnyam pas gang zag mnyam pa nyid mnyam mo/ /gang zag mnyam pa nyid kyis chos mnyam pa nyid mnyam
510a5(mdo sde): mo| |chos mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par grol ba mnyam pa nyid mnyam ste/ rnam par grol ba mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa ni/ byang chub bo/ /'jam dpal/ gzugs
510a6(mdo sde): la chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams kyi mig ni/ chags pa yin no/ /gzugs dang mig gi rang bzhin shes pa ni/ chags pa med pa yin no/ /lta ba la chags
510a7(mdo sde): par gyur pa rnams kyi rang gi lus ni/ chags pa yin no/ /lta bar gyur pa thams cad kyi rang gi lus kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid du shes pa ni/ chags pa med pa yin
510b1(mdo sde): no| |tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni/ chags pa yin no/ /tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i chos la so
510b2(mdo sde): sor rtog cing ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid du shes pa ni/ chags pa med pa yin no/ /the tshom gyi dri ma la chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams kyi thar pa ni/ chags
510b3(mdo sde): pa yin no/ /mos pa dang rnam par grol ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa ni/ chags pa med pa yin no/ /le lo'i dri ma la chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams
510b4(mdo sde): kyi rtogs par bya ba la brtson 'grus brtan pa nyid ni/ chags pa yin no/ /chos ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa ni/ chags pa med pa yin no/ /sgrib pa la chags pas chags
510b5(mdo sde): par gyur pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/ chags pa yin no/ /sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa shes pa ni/ chags pa med pa yin no/ /rang bzhin gyis yongs su
510b6(mdo sde): dag pa'i chos thams cad ni/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las 'byung ste/ de la byang chub sems dpas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang / rnam par byang ba'i rgyu'ang yongs su shes
510b7(mdo sde): par bya zhing / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i rgyu rnam par dag pas kyang gnas par mi bya'o/ /bdag kun nas slong ba dang / lta ba kun
511a1(mdo sde): nas slong ba ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin no/ /chos bdag med pa la 'jug pa'i bzod pa ni/ rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no/ /ngar
511a2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / nga rgyal gyi lta ba ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin no/ /nang nye bar zhi pa dang / phyi rol tu rgyu ba med pa ni/ rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no/ /'dod pa dang /

511a5(mdo sde): dag pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni/ rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no/ /sgrib pa lnga ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin no/ /dbang po lnga ni/ rnam par byang ba'i

511a7(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni/ rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no/ /log pa nyid brgyad ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin no/ /yang dag
511b1(mdo sde): pa nyid brgyad ni/ rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no/ /kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin no/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
511b2(mdo sde): 'jug pa dgu ni/ rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no/ /mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin no/ /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni/ rnam par byang ba'i
511b3(mdo sde): rgyu yin te/ mdor na mi dge ba yid la byed pa thams cad ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin no/ /dge ba yid la byed pa thams cad ni/ rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no/ /de

512b1(mdo sde): zhi ba ni| gang zhe na/ nang ni/ zhi ba yin no/ /phyi rol ni/ nye bar zhi ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ mig ni/ bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ de'i rang bzhin

512b5(mdo sde): dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /lce ni/ bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir de ni/ zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /des lce stong pa

513a1(mdo sde): bdag gis stong ste/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir de ni/ zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /des yid stong pa zhes bya bar yongs su shes nas chos rnams la mi

516b7(mdo sde): ni| sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas bzhi po de dag ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags par shes so/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub ces bya ba de ni/ stong pa nyid kyi tshig
517a1(mdo sde): bla dwags yin te/ 'jam dpal/ stong pa nyid gang gis byang chub stong pa'i stong pa nyid des chos thams cad kyang stong ste/ 'jam dpal
517a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ de dag ji ltar stong pa de lta bu kho nar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /'jam dpal/ stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid mngon par rdzogs
517a3(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas pa'ang ma yin te/ 'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dam/ byang chub de ni/ shes pa'i tshul gcig pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/ gang la
517a4(mdo sde): stong pa nyid kyang med/ byang chub kyang med pa de la ni/ 'jam dpal/ gang gis stong pa nyid dang / byang chub sems gnyis su dbye ba'i gnyis ni/ cung zad kyang
517a5(mdo sde): med do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ gnyis su med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ gnyis su dbyer med pa/ ming med pa/ mtshan
517a6(mdo sde): ma med pa/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ spyod pa med pa/ kun 'byung ba med pa/ yi ge med
517a7(mdo sde): pa| sgra med pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bam bo gsum pa ste/ tha ma/ 'jam dpal/ stong pa nyid ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par
517b1(mdo sde): zhe na pa med pa dang / 'dzin pa med pa'i tshig bla dwags yin te/ 'jam dpal/ de la ni/ don dam par na gang stong pa zhes bya ba'i chos gang yang dmigs su med do/ /
517b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes brjod kyang nam mkha' ni/ brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du stong pa stong pa
517b3(mdo sde): zhes brjod kyang stong pa pa ni/ brjod par bya ba ma yin te/ chos thams cad kyis 'jug pa ni/ de lta bu yin no/ /'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ ming med pa yin
517b4(mdo sde): na| de dag la ming gis brjod par byed de/ 'jam dpal/ ming ni/ yul na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin no/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar ming yul
517b5(mdo sde): na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin pa de bzhin du gang gis chos gang brjod par byed pa'i chos de'ang yul na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma
517b6(mdo sde): yin no| |'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ chos de dag thams cad de ltar gzod ma nas ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ sems dang
517b7(mdo sde): yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med par shes so/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar shes pa de kho na bzhin du rnam par grol te/ bcings pa las
518a1(mdo sde): grol bar gyur pa ma yin no/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub ni/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ nam mkha' ni/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam
518a2(mdo sde): pa ma yin la byang chub kyang mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ chos gang la yang dag par yongs su 'grub pa med pa
518a3(mdo sde): de ni| mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam par brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ de ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa med pa

518a5(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas shing / yang dag pa'i shes pas chos de dag ji lta bu kho nar shes so/ /'jam dpal/ yang dag pa'i shes pa'ang gang zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ chos

518b1(mdo sde): dang / 'jig pa la brten nas chos rnams 'jug par 'gyur yang 'di la 'jug par 'gyur ba gang yang med de/ de ni/ lam gyi rgyun bcad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa

524b1(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag / mtshan ma med la zhugs gyur pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi gnas dmigs pa mi mnga' ba/ /shes rab bsags shing mnyam par bzhag /chos la
524b2(mdo sde): mnga' dbang brnyes gyur pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can kun gyi sgra skad dang / de bzhin gzugs dang spyod lam dag /skad cig gcig gis gzigs mdzad pa/ /
524b3(mdo sde): mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ming dang gzugs las rnam par grol/ /rgyud dang phung po thams cad bcad/ /rnam pa med la 'jug mdzad pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
524b4(mdo sde): mtshan ma dag dang rnam bral zhing / /mtshan ma'i rnam pa rnam par spangs/ /mtshan ma med la 'jug mdzad pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag rtog pas rnam ma brtags
524b5(mdo sde): thugs yid rab tu mi gnas shing / /yid mdzad mi mnga' mi dgongs pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' 'dra bar gnas mi mnga'/ /thogs pa mi mnga' spros mi
524b6(mdo sde): mnga'| |nam mkha' mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' dbus mtha' ma mchis pa/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de dang 'dra/ /dus
524b7(mdo sde): gsum yang dag 'dus gyur pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha'i mtshan nyid sangs rgyas te/ /nam mkha'ang mtshan nyid mchis ma lags/ /rgyu dang 'bras
525a1(mdo sde): bu rnam grol la/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngar 'dzin mi mnga' sgra mi mnga'/ /gzung ba ma mchis chu zla 'dra/ /chos rnams kun la
525a2(mdo sde): mi gnas pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po rnams dang skye mched dang / khams rnams dag la mig nas pa/ /phyin ci log las rnam par grol/ /mi rten
525a3(mdo sde): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtha' gnyis dag las rnam grol zhing / bdag tu lta ba yang dag bcas/ /chos dbyings mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal
525a4(mdo sde): lo| |gzugs kyi grangs las rnam grol zhing / /dam chos ma lags rnam par spangs/ /len dang gtong ba mi mnga' ba/ mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud kyi ming
525a5(mdo sde): las rab 'das shing / /chos kun rtogs par thugs su chud/ /sgrib pa mi mnga' chos gyur pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don 'tshal rnams kyis mchis mi
525a6(mdo sde): brjod| |ma mchis zhes kyang brjod mi bgyi/ /len med tshig lam ma mchis pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnyis kyi chos la mi rten par/ /theg pa'i rgyal mtshan
525a7(mdo sde): kun tu btsugs/ /gnyis dang gnyis med rnam grol ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis yid kyi nyes pa dang / /lus kyi nad bzhi pham par mdzad/ /bsam yas dpe
525b1(mdo sde): dang rnam bral ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lhun gyis grub par 'jug mdzad cing / /nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /spyod pa mkhyen pas thog drangs pa/ /mi
525b2(mdo sde): rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod dgongs zhi zhing zag mi mnga'/ /'byung min 'byung ba'i bdag can/ /gnas dang rtog pa mi mnga' ba/ /mi rten khyod la
525b3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /dmigs pa mi mnga' thugs kyis su/ /kun gyi sems ni rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag gzhan 'du shes mi mnga' ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal
525b4(mdo sde): lo| |dmigs dang dmigs pa rnams kyis ni/ /kun gyi sems ni rmongs par bgyid/ /sgrib pa med pa'i chos gyur pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dmigs
525b5(mdo sde): pa dag dang sems rnams ni/ /ngo bo nyid mchis ma lags/ /bsam yas mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas pa mi
525b6(mdo sde): mnga' mkhyen pa yis/ /zhing rnams kun dang de bzhin du/ /sems can kun gyi spyod gzigs pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis
525b7(mdo sde): lan dga' yang / /sems dang chos kun gtan ma dmigs/ /chos rnams thams cad kun mkhyen pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kun sgyu ma lta bu
526a1(mdo sde): ste| |sgyu ma nyid kyang mchis ma lags/ /sgyu ma'i chos las rnam grol ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs sangs
526a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten spyod mdzad kyang / /'jig rten chos la rten mi mdzad/ /'jig rten rnam rtog mi mnga' ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong phyir stong la spyod
526a3(mdo sde): mdzad cing / /khyod nyid stong zhing spyod yul stong / /stong pa stong par ston mdzad pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang / /rdzu
526a4(mdo sde): 'phrul chen pos rnam 'phrul zhing / /tha dad ma mchis snyoms zhugs pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /du ma ma lags gcig ma lags/ /ring dang
526a5(mdo sde): nye la mi 'jug cing / /gdeg dang gzhag pa mi mnga' ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /skad cig gcig la mngon sangs
526a6(mdo sde): rgyas| |dngos ma mchis par mnyam bzhag pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dren pa dus rnams thams cad du/ /mi g.yo mya ngan 'das pa rtogs/ /
526a7(mdo sde): sna tshogs thabs dang ldan pa po/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnams kyi brgyud pa'i thabs/ /mkhyen pas mkhas par gyur pa lags/ /de phyir
526b1(mdo sde): mi g.yo mya ngan 'das/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan ma mi mnga' lhun gyis grub/ /spros pa mi mnga' skyon mi mnga'/ /snang med bdag gi mi mnga' ba/ /

526b4(mdo sde): rnams nges par thugs su chud gyur pa/ /'gro ba kun gyi 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun sbyor 'ching ba bcad pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol
526b5(mdo sde): byon te thang la zhugs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye bo ngal pa'i rnam 'dren khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor bar gshegs shing mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal
526b6(mdo sde): lo| |'gro ba thams cad dag na sems can rnams dang ni/ /thabs cig bzhugs kyang thugs yid rab dben pa/ /ji ltar pad+ma chab kyis gos par mi 'gyur
526b7(mdo sde): zhing / /sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong nyid shin tu bsten/ /mtshan ma thams cad rnams pa kun tu rnam par bshig /khyod la gang yang smon par mdzad pa
527a1(mdo sde): mchis ma lags/ /ston pa'i go 'phang bla med dben pa nyid lags te/ /dmigs pa med chu bo rgal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal

527a7(mdo sde): ni| sus kyang mthong ba ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ mchod pa ma yin te/ mchod par byed pa'ang ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni/ chos 'ga' yang
527b1(mdo sde): gcig pa nyid dam/ mang po nyid du mi mdzad pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub brnyes pa med do/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni/ chos gang gis kyang rab tu
527b2(mdo sde): 'byed par mi byed do/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ chos 'ga' yang ma gzigs/ ma gsan/ ma dgongs/ rnam par mi mkhyen/ kun tu mi mkhyen to/ /sangs
527b3(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyis ni/ ma gsungs/ ma brjod do/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ mi gsung / mi brjod do/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni/ gsung bar mi 'gyur/
527b4(mdo sde): brjod par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni /chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par
527b5(mdo sde): 'tshang ma rgyas so/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni/ nyon mongs pa ma spangs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ rnam par byang ba mngon sum du ma mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas
527b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni/ chos gang yang ma gzigs/ /ma gsan/ ma myangs/ ma ma nams/ ma reg /mi mkhyen to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/
527b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni/ gzod ma nas yongs su dag pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa gang la la
528a1(mdo sde): z hig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rang rgyal ba nyid la bkod pa bas

528a5(mdo sde): dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes can dang /
528a6(mdo sde): 'du shes med pa dang / rkang pa med pa dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / rkang mang gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus
528a7(mdo sde): thob par gyur la/ mi'i lus thob nas kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur la/ byang chub tu sems bskyed nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang sangs
528b1(mdo sde): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas/ nyan thos dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la bskal pa gang+gA'i

528b3(mdo sde): byed cing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang nye bar sgrub par byed la/ de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten rin po che las byas pa'i 'phang du
528b4(mdo sde): dpag tshad brgya yod pa/ rin po che'i lan kan gyis yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang /
528b5(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas kun nas g.yogs pa sha stag kyang byed du bcug pa bas ni/ 'jam dpal/ byang
528b6(mdo sde): c hub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
528b7(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos par byed/ 'jug par byed/ yid ches par byed cing / yongs su rtogs par byas nas kyang tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su
529a1(mdo sde): bcad pa gcig tsam zhig lung 'bogs par byed na/ de ni/ de bas ches sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ba'i

531b4(mdo sde): 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag mthong bar gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas/ nyan thos dang bcas pa re re la'ang

531b6(mdo sde): dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis kyang bsnyen bkur byed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la'ang nyin gcig bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
531b7(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos yongs su bkang ste dbul bar phul ba bas

532a3(mdo sde): ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des ni/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha
532a4(mdo sde): dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi rnam
532a5(mdo sde): grangs 'di thos pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi phyag rgya yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la
532a6(mdo sde): la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
532a7(mdo sde): gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig don gyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod par gyur na/ de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par
532b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad don gyi rjes su 'brang
532b2(mdo sde): ba nyid la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod par gyur na/ de ni/ de
532b3(mdo sde): bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
532b4(mdo sde): kyi sems can thams cad chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs
532b5(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur na/ de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la
532b6(mdo sde): la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang
532b7(mdo sde): zhig gis sems can gcig cig lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /
533a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lan
533a2(mdo sde): gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par
533a3(mdo sde): gyur na| de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs
533a4(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems
533a5(mdo sde): can gcig cig dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod par gyur na/ de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te
533a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems
533a7(mdo sde): dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod par gyur na/ de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur
533b1(mdo sde): ro| |'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod pa
533b2(mdo sde): bas ni| byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig byang chub kyi sems la bkod par gyur na/ de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs
533b3(mdo sde): med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad byang
533b4(mdo sde): chub kyi sems la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig phyir mi ldog pa nyid la bkod par gyur na/ de ni/ de
533b5(mdo sde): bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
533b6(mdo sde): kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa nyid la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing yi ger 'brir
533b7(mdo sde): bcug nas gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / tha na sems can gcig cig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'jug par byas na/ de ni/ de bas ches
534a1(mdo sde): bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal
534a2(mdo sde): to| |byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig zad pa'i dus mtha'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu'i dam chos 'dzin pa bas/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni nyan par byed gyur
534a3(mdo sde): na| |de ni de bas bsod nams chen po khyad par 'phags/ /gang zhig rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis phyogs bcur song nas ni/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu dag la mchod
534a4(mdo sde): byed cing / /snying rje bskyed de bde ba kun la chags med par/ /skyes bu dam pa thams cad phyag 'tshal btsud pa bas/ /gang zhig bder gshegs bstan la sems
534a5(mdo sde): rab dad gyur cing / /rgyal ba'i chos rnams smon par byed pa'i mdo sde 'di/ /gzhan la yud tsam gcig cig ston par byed gyur na/ /de ni de bas bsod nams
534a6(mdo sde): 'bras bu khyad par 'phags/ /bde gshegs bstan pa'i mdo sde sgron mar gyur pa 'di/ /gang gis lha dang mi la yang dag bstan/ /byas pa de ni shes rab rno zhing
534a7(mdo sde): mthu chen ldan gyur la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis bde gshegs sangs rgyas mi mchog de dag ni/ /phung po lhag ma med
534b1(mdo sde): par yongs su mya ngan las/ /'das par gyur ba dag gi de 'dra'i sgra thos nas/ /sems can gzhan la'ang yang dag sgrog par byed gyur cing / /mchod rten gnam 'phang mtho
534b2(mdo sde): ba srid rtse'i mthar thug pa/ /khyon dang ldan par gyur pa'ang srid rtse ji bzhin pa/ /rin chen mdzes pas spras shing gdugs dang ba dan dang / /de bzhin dril sgras mdzes par byed
534b3(mdo sde): du gcig gyur pas/ /'di na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'di 'dra ba'i/ /mdo sde 'di thos lus la gnas par 'gyur ba'am/ /glegs bam bri ba byas te gzhag par
534b4(mdo sde): byed 'dod na/ /de ni de yi bsod nams 'bras bu khyad par 'phags/ /ser sna'i dri ma bsal bar gyur cing 'jigs med pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig chos 'di
534b5(mdo sde): 'dzin byed na/ /de yi bsod nams dpag tu yod par mi 'gyur te/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /mdo 'di bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis rab
534b6(mdo sde): bsngags shing / /byang chub sems dpa' mang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku lus nam mkha' yi/ /khams dang 'dra ba thams cad 'dir ni
534b7(mdo sde): bstan pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems
535a1(mdo sde): dpa' dang / nyan thos chen po grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
535a2(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
535a3(mdo sde): yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA
535a4(mdo sde): ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ zhus dag/ //
